title: Growing on me Vistara
text: Vistara my first flight 4 years ago to now , consistent and there is some feeling of luxary , cant define but there.. Some thing special over all a great joy of flying

title: Best Service
text: I had a very nice journey last week when I was coming from delhi, Ground staff & cabin crew were so helpful and nice with me as I was not feeling well. They had given me medicine in flight and continuously asking about how I am feeling. I am happy with the service, and suggest the people who are travelling to take Vistara flights.

title: NO:1 AIRLINE OF INDIA
text:
On 03/JAN/2019 , due to fog  and bad weather all airlines flights to Delhi were delayed , so as our flight  . But Check in staff was cooperative and couteous they offered us seats in earliest available another Vistara flight , which made us reach on time.
Inflight meals was very good and staff was smart and courteous.

title: Best Indian airline!
text: I read the positive reviews before flying and can now say that they were all true. This airline stands out in India! The ground and inflight crew were extremely friendly and the food was actually good.

title: World best flight service
text: In November I traveled from Delhi to Cochin by vistra. I traveled first time in vistra. When I entered in flight first I saw the seat is to good very comfortable and services are very high level... Thank you vistra

title: If you are looking for an airline that provides best of the flying experience in India then fly Vistara
text: I will keep this short  and crisp. This is the best airline to fly with in India. Also they have special provisions for women passengers travelling alone. All you need to do is to ask for assistance. Believe me you will be delighted by the service.

title: Good airline horrible staff
text:
We flew in to Delhi from Kochi with my parents and family. Our flight experience was amazing. Wonderful air hostess and excellent service.

What made me to write terrible review was the experience we had once we landed in Delhi.

My father who is unable to walk needed wheelchair, we had requested this in Kochi were he was provided one. Once we landed I requested same at the gate, staff showed us the list and said there is no wheel chair request for us so we can't get. They told us to go out and we will get vistara wheelchair there at the door.

My father dragged himself out only to find that there is no wheelchair. I found Air India staff carrying wheel chair and I requested him if I can use it? Staff told me to go back to the aircraft door and request Vistara staff to arrange one.

When I went back all hell broke. Staff got very upset at me when I told there is no wheel chair outside and why they let my father to walk that far knowing no Vistara wheel chair service at the door.
Angry ground staff threatened me to call police and beat me up. They told me that they are on duty and can harm my physically. It was the worst experience I ever had.

I came back to the door, requested again to Air India employee to carry my father and at the airport I complained to manager on duty. She took my details, promised me to look at the incident and apologized for the experience we had. So far I have not heard back from her or anyone else from Vistara. 

I made multiple calls to find out what was done in this regards? I sent mails but still waiting for the response.

I am wondering how staff can treat us in such a bad way, how they can force my father to walk who is sick and unable to walk more than 5 feet. Why they don’t think that helping sick person is their responsibility and why they can threaten a passenger with beating and harming physically?

Does this shows Tata Quality? I took Vistara for one reason only, that was Tata name and Quality. 

Totally disappointed at the expense at airport and on management as so far no update or action on my complaint. Seems management don’t care and they are complacent

title: Business class - great experience
text:
The hostesses treat you with so much of respect and make you feel special. They serve you welcome drink as soon as you are seated. You get a choice of hot or cold towel. You are shared a food menu card and they ask you for your preference. 
Mocktails they make is very tasty and you can order more than one.

The seats are comfortable with pillow & blanket in case you need. Overhead storage is more than adequate as the seats are less compared to the economy section. 

The inflight entertainment you can use on the phone provided you have the app downloaded.
By the time you reach the terminal and to the baggage carousel your wait for your baggage to come would hardly be 3 to 4 mins, which is highly appreciated.

A world class domestic airlines.

title: Vistara
text: Wow! My husband is 6 feet 2 inches and there was plenty of leg roo. For him.  The plane was clean and the flight attendants very friendly!  Totally enjoyed this trip!

title: No jacket hangar and disinterested airhostess
text: Its worse than indigo as some times the service is good and sometimes u get a disinterested air hostess . The premium economy is always cramped and u neber have enough space for bags.in addition they sometimes decline even taking your jacket to hang...overaall its indigo with better food...but unlike indigo service is unpredictable

title: The preimum economy is cramped no jacket storage
text: Disappointed as they don't have space for jackets. Essentially the premium economy is like Indigo but with better food. If you are flying to eat then vistara is good but if you have a hostess like the one i did on 11th Jan flying to Mumbai....you will like Indigo...ladt two times they hung the jacket now its only for business class apparently.

title: They should maintain this standard
text:
The carrier is good and after a long time flying is a pleasure.

Aircraft is good, attendant are nice, food is good.

They should get more sectors and once in a while serve Starbucks French press in economy 😁

But most important they should continue the good job and maintain standards of service and security both of the planes and the staff.

title: Best Domestic Carrier In India
text:
Definitely a cut above !
We flew on many domestic flights during our visit to India and this airline proved superior in every category.
They are partnered with Singapore Airlines and it shows.
Other domestic carriers (worldwide) could learn from them.

title: Impressed
text: This was about a 1.5 hour flight. They actually served us food and beverage. A few american airlines should take note of service. We can't get a cup of water on a 3 hour flight!

title: Absolutely Convenient
text: Travelled first time from Vistara and believe me it was one of the great flights. The leg space is amazing. The food (provided free of cost) was also delicious. The staff was very friendly. A must recommend and love to fly again soon.

title: Horrible customer service and harrasement
text:
I had a confirmed ticket from Bengalaru to New Delhi. After a long day, when I reached the airport early to sit and relax, I didn't know I had to dealt with the worst customer experience and harrasement by Mr. Nayyar (the airport manager) and his staff. 

First my check in was blocked at the kiosk, so when I approached the counter, the ordeal begin. They had oversold the tickets so they asked me to give my seat and fly next day. Even though I refused politely, they continued to harass for the next one hour. Mr. Nayyar finally said, just get out from here and refused to give me boarding pass.

Just pure mismanagement and harrasement. Avoid at least flying from Begalaru airport.

title: Food
text:
Normally Vistara is known for good food ,served hot and neatly packed. I love to travel as Vistara is best as far as food is concerned. Normally they serve Aam-Doi ( Mother dairy) for dessert, but last week  they served very sweet ( too much sugar) dessert items.
Please take care of diabetics!

title: WORST Customer Service
text:
Had the absolute WORST experience with this airline today. Had 2 business class tickets to Delhi. Called their customer service the day before to confirm baggage allowances and their agent (Mohit) clearly told me since I was going to DC after a 3-4 day stay in Delhi, the allowance would be 32 Kg per suitcase per passenger. Confirmed with him twice and packed accordingly. Got to the airport and they said that unless I travel on an international flight within 24 hours of my reaching Delhi, the baggage allowance is only 30 kg (total) per passenger!!!! Totally not what Mohit told me the day before. Vistara confirmed the call and admitted that the guy never mentioned the “24 hour” travel rule YET did nothing to accommodate me or my daughter. They ruined our plans to Delhi, messed up my mood and made me
Miss my flight. The manager (Trilok N)was of ZERO use and did absolutely nothing to accommodate us. I offered to pay for half since I would assume some responsibility as I should have checked their website and not taken their agents word, she just stood there and was on her phone and ultimately made me miss my flight. The worst part they just don’t need give a damn. Totally not customer friendly and I would not recommend this airline to anyone. Worst experience in India so far and that too from an airline that advertises themselves as a friendly, new, customer oriented airline. All BS!! I will make sure the upper management heads about this nonsense and the inconvenience they caused us. 

WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!

title: Classy airline
text: With Singapore Airlines as co owner one would expect this to be a great way to travel. Vistara adds the finishing touches to ordinary service and ordinary flight crew uniforms.  Very well done with a relatively new Airbus A320 kept in like new condition. Hard to believe this is an economy airline. Highly recommend

title: Delay due to Fog in Delhi
text:
Recently flew from Lucknow to Delhi.

Flight was delayed due to Fog in Delhi.

Refreshments were given due to delay.

The inflight snack of sandwiches can do with a regular change as the sandwich can get a bit monotonous.

Service, take off and landing was good.

title: Convenient and value for Money
text: Flying for the first time with Vistara, I found this airline to be value for money as compared to JetAirways for Domestic travel as it has big aircrafts, space is also pretty good and meal provided is also good quality and tasty.

title: Travel by Vistara
text: Once again I have travelled with family by Vistara and found excellent experience. The plane, service, staff everything was up to the mark. A very comfortable and enjoying flight. Full mark to internal staff.

title: Excellent airline
text: This was my first time with Vistara and I am a fan. Courteous and professional ground staff as well as cabin crew. Will definitely choose them over other airlines in the future.

title: Vistara ground staff need additional training and knowledge
text:
My wife and I were flying from Amritsar to Delhi to connect our onward flight to Dubai and Glasgow (business class). Firstly the ground staff refused to check our baggage all the way to Glasgow that meant that we had to collect our baggage in Delhi and check in again at Emirates desk. Emirates and Vistara are partner airlines according to Vistara in flight magazine. 
Secondly the ground staff refused to accept that our baggage allowance in the business class was 40 kg per person and quibbled about our total baggage was 9 kg over our allowance (20 kg per person). The check in staff including the manager spend 10 minutes perusing through our itinerary. We spent our 30 minutes at the desk checking in.
According to Emirates this should not have happened and mentioned that they could not comment or take up the issue with Vistara

title: Best Airline Company in India
text: Tata reliable and Singapore advancement both make this airline the best airline of india, best service meal and inflight entertainment

title: memorable flight
text:
very good flight on time departure on time arrrival in delhi .. 

good jain food was an advantage ... willtravel again...

title: Value for money experience
text: A very good experience  right from check in to arrival. Neatly and smartly dressed staff with courteous smile and helping attitude. One feels to travel again and again. Aircrafts are also well maintained with good interiors and you get a class experience and value for money.

title: Very sequenced flight entry. Comfortable seats and snacks. Plane took off and landed quite smoothly.
text: Comfortable seats and snacks. Plane took off and landed quite smoothly.. very clean interior and adequate light. Temperature maintained was great

title: Best in Class Service. Excellent Loyalty Benefits
text:
This airline is highly organised whether on ground or in the air. The Web Portal & Mobile apps are very user friendly and easy to use for bookings, Check-in and Loyalty Management.
The Loyalty program and benefits of booking directly through Airline Web portal are amazing. Faster boarding, Priority Luggage handover, extra baggage, regular Free flight / Lounge / Upgrade vouchers on achieving milestones. This is the best Airline Loyalty I have experience so far and one can actually see and feel the benefits of being loyal.
The airline staff is highly professional and organised including the way boarding is managed to how the passenger services are handled in-flight.
Food is excellent, with changing variety from frequent flyers perspective and high quality and taste. The presentation is excellent.
The safety and security which the airline gives a feeling of is unmatched. Once had an experience of a highly turbulent flight during a dust storm while landing at Delhi airport. The way the pilots and crew handled the situation was amazing.
All in all, the best airline experience anywhere in the world especially for a domestic airline

title: Short and sweet flight
text:
Flew on the Lucknow to Delhi flight of 6pm.

Small delay of 15 odd mins at start which was made up by landing on time.

Smooth take off and even better landing.

In flight service of veg and non veg sandwiches was great.

Comfortable seats

Professional service

title: Poor app interface, sleepy sounding pilot
text: Once again, a poor experience on Vistara. While the check-in, onboarding was smooth, I found that the Vistaraworld App interface was really poor and unresponsive. It seems ages behind what several other airlines seem to offer. The inflight experience was fair on most aspects except the pilot announcements which sounded really bizarre, almost as if the pilot was sleepy or groggy, making his speech incomprehensible. Professional airlines pay a lot of attention to such little things, which Vistara seems to have ignored. The air conditioning was below average and the cabin was warmer than my expectations throughout the flight. The departure gate at the Delhi T3 was quite far too, leading to quite a long walk from the entry to the departure gate. The inflight food was average, the seats satisfactory for the class and the crew professional. The flight performance was on time. I found nothing exemplary in the overall experience to prefer Vistara over any other airline - it's just another airline amidst the so many available.

title: Nice Flying Experience
text: This is the first time I was flying on the Vistara airline and my experience had been good. I took the flight from Kolkata to Chennai and it is on time at both arrival and departure. The seating is very comfortable and the food tasted good. The flight was clean and the staff were efficient.

title: Nice crews, can we have more flights on more paths
text: One of the finest fruit platter I have. The crew is very nice on all fronts. Again let us have more flights to fly across India

title: Good airline
text: Have flown them a few times now and compared to some of the other operators in India they maybe in the top three. However, it’s no where close to Singapore Airlines, with whom they have a joint venture. The difference is that the service is mechanical versus SA, where one feels individually pampered. title: Nice fresh and cool crew and super hot food

title: Premium Economy
text: It was Sheer Delightful Experience having got chance fly on their Premium Economy , Excellent Customer Services , Great Food , Beautiful Ambience of aircraft one of best no words Vistara is always be first choice to fly on, Keep on good work and Look forward Flying with you in Future too

title: Lowest Fares with decent Free Meals!!!
text:
Like most Tata Products and Services, Vistara too stands out in the Crowd.

The first thing that delighted me was the rock bottom fare inclusive of Food!!! 
I was initially thinking the food since free might be some packaged chips and biscuits BUT It was a proper Breakfast!!! Loved It and Thank you... 
For travellers like me who cant afford the outrageously priced food both at the airport and in flight, this was a blessing considering that you have to reach the airport min 120 mins in advance + travel time from home to the airport - and the minimum 2.5hr flying time its too long for anyone to not be hungry.

The next was the care taken in design and look and feel of EVERYTHING - from the boarding passes to the Aircraft Body Graphics, Amazing Choice of Colors!! the Brilliant Logo.

After travelling in such crammed aircrafts Vistara was such a blessing, Vistara does not make you feel that if you cant afford expensive tickets you must travel like piled up caged chicken.

It was a really great experience!! Hope you dont compromise in the future... Else i will not delay in sharing that too online... 

Thank you..

title: Very Professional

title: Very nice and comfortable experience !!
text: Very nice and comfortable experience !! Great food, supportive staff, ontime service. good check in experience.

title: not for tall people
text: Not being able to get an economy seat with extra leg room (e.g., exit row), I upgraded. Little did I know that there were 3 classes of seats on this small airplane. title: Best Domestic Airline
text: I have very limited words to describe the experience I had on my flight in Vistara airlines. Courteous staff, varied in flight snacks and on time flight schedule are the most attractive features of these airlines. Superb and relaxing seats. Highly professional staff. Most recommended flight to travel in India.

title: Best domestic Indian airline
text:

Many many thanks & with gratitude 

I will definitely pick you over other domestic airlines next time I travel & also let my friends know about your high quality of service 

Charu

title: Very good

Price a bit higher but worth it

Highly recommended

title: nice experience
text:
i liked the orderliness of the airline,it's cleanliness and the quality of the service - in and off flight. in particular,the talk from the cockpit was informative and not cursory as is customary in most airlines.
the food was good and well presented,the tea and coffee were fragrant and strong and the hostesess friendly and very helpful. not much clutter in the magazine pouches,the seats comfortable and the craft and toilets clean.
i've flown vistara before and am happy that they live up to their promise everytime!

title: TRAVEL WITH A SMILE ON VISTARA
text:
Vistara is by far a very steady Airline.Passenger whether a celebrity or a simple Senior Citizen,Each one is treated with utmost courtesy.Comfort,discipline and Courtesy are
of a high order.There is adequate leg room,schedules are followed,and there is no crisis at any point of time.

Staff on board and on ground all seem to be motivated.They do not seem to be pestering for effect,they are genuinely polita and concerned.

title: Great food in Economy Class
text: Greaf food was served with efficient service on my trip from Mumbai to Delhi on 20th December 2018 on Air Vistara.

title: YES.YES.YES - AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE - AJU AND AKHIL (COCHI) WERE AMAZING
text: Never written a review for a airline in my life, but had to leave one for this one after the amazing service I received. I was traveling alone in India for business. As a female, this wasn't the most comfortable experience. I had to go from Cochi to Chandigarh to see a vendor so I booked this flight at the last minute. This visit was very important so I deliberately chose this airline over some of the others in the country because I read that this airline was fairly reliable and I couldn't afford a canceled flight. When I got to the airport I learned about the weight limit for carry-ons. I begged and pleaded (like an entitled a-hole when I think about it in hindsight) for them to make me an exception because I had work materials and several other important items that I NEEDED for my vendor visit.. I offered to pay for the bag but they said they really weren't able to allow weight overages in economy class. They could only do so for business class customers. AJU AND AKHIL spent what felt like . hours trying to help me get an affordable business class . We weren't able to find any that were affordable, but they tried just about every thing they could to ensure that my bag was tended to. In the end they put special labeling on my bag, personally escorted me through the baggage process, and did virtually everything they could to make sure my bag made it to my final destination. This really meant a lot to me, given the circumstances. I've never seen service like this at an airline. I am so glad I traveled with them and not another carrier. The actual flight was great - organized boarding, great snacks, friendly airline attendants, and easy flight. This was so comforting and calming to me during a stressful time. Will definitely be flying with them again because I know that their service is impeccable and that if anything goes wrong they will do everything they possibly can to make it right. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.

title: Excellent Airline
text: Excellent service. Hostesses are very polite and always ready to serve with a smile. Found it always on-time so far. Well maintained aircraft too.

title: Very good experience with Vistara airlines entire family enjoyed their good Hospitality and service
text: We flew to Delhi in Vistara airlines and we were very happy with the kind of service and the hospitality the air hostesses gave us. My 7 yr daughter got a lot of pampering from them and she enjoyed reading the helpful comic given by Vistara team,explaining their rules and responsibility with in the flight you need to take. The food was awesome. They were giving the shawls and making every passenger so comfortable with out getting irritated for multiple queries which other passengers were having.  I was so pleased with the entire experience I had. If you book ahead you will get the tickets for good price as well.

title: Amazing in flight welcome and service
text: I traveled on Air Vistara on 15th December from Delhi to Ahmedabad.  This was my first time to experience the hospitality of Air Visatara.  Believe it was amazing flight and brand new aircraft.  Moreover the welcome and inflight food and service was comparable to the best in the world.

title: Pleasantly surprised with the quality of customer service
text:
Finally a airline that understands customer service. 
Hospitality was something that was missing in the Indian airlines, and Vistara definitely fills that void. 
All the staff was well behaved and patient. They were open to listening all the request. Definitely understand that not all requirements can be met.

Food was also nice. 

Great baggage allowance by paying little more for premium economy. 

Also, I think they are the only one to offer this class in India. 

Overall, will definitely recommend and I hope the quality and hospitality is maintained as they grow.

title: Best domestic airline
text: My experience with this airline was amazing. Everything was so comfortable as I was traveling with both my children and husband.

title: FLIGHT CANCELLATION WITHOUT NOTIFICATION
text: I am flying from Sydney to Chennai by another airline and had booked & paid to fly from Chennai ( MAA) to Kochi by Vistara Air on 27th January 2019 for 2 of us. They had confirmed the flights, sent e tickets to my email on 29th October 2018, sent another e mail on 10th November 2019 with an offer to upgrade to Business class. By chance when I went to check up my flight details in Vistara website, I found a warning in the booking. When I phoned Vistara from Sydney, they told me that the flight in that route has been cancelled and there is no other flight by Vistara from Chennai to Kochi. The lady in that enquiry line offered me to cancel the flight for Refund. But even now on19thDec2018, after my enquiry over phone and e mail, I have not received any information regarding the flight cancellation, or cancellation of our booked flights or the status. This is the reliability of this Vistara Airline. I would advise the travelers to be very cautious. If required , I can send a copy of my e-ticket with numbers : 228-2401810925 & 228-2401810926 for flight no: UK734 on 27th January 2019 at 13:45 at Chennai, Please note that I have given the booked date, for the travel date, as there is no option to provide the booked date

title: Flight delay made it a bad experience!
text:
Flight was delayed but I had good as weel as bad experience.

Quite RUDE!

title: The best airline in a domestic region
text: The staff and the food is relay good. Leg space is far more better than the other domestic flights. The outside noice was quite low and the whether tuber-lance was handled properly.

title: Be well in advance to catch a flight at Bagdogra airport
text: Bagdogra airport is one of the most congested airports with long queues at all places . Being a military airport there is extra security in place and being a very busy airport huge rush is there.So be on time

title: Best Airline!
text: Excellent Airlines for travel. True value for money as their premium economy class brings out business class treatment at a very small price difference on the economy tickets. Great interiors, courteous staff, good food and timely flights.

title: First experience in Vistara
text: I loved flying in Vistara. I loved the comfort, I loved the service, I loved the behavior of the air hostesses and I loved the fact that we were lucky enough to get bumped into premium economy class. They serve premium Starbucks coffee to the patrons which really impressed me. The only thing by which I was disappointed was the quantity was very less in the lunch which was provided to us. We had various assortments along with it which actually made us full but this shouldn't be overlooked. to conclude my flight was awesome and worthwhile.

title: Flight to and fro Srinagar via Delhi
text: It was my first time travelling by Vistara. It was beautiful flight and although it was winter and cloudy we had the smoothest flight. I recollect that we had a beautiful landing in Delhi on December 7th via our flight from Srinagar at 16:00 hrs. Towards the end of the flight, we informed this to the airhostess who introduced us to the lady pilot. The customer service was great, however, the snack could be improved. Also it would have been nice if there was inflight entertainment. Wifi availability is there through which internet can be accessed.

title: Clean, timely and clear announcements
text: Aircraft is clean and neat, with comfortable sears. In flight announcements are pretty clear. Staff is very friendly and accomodative.

title: Nice domestic airlines
text:
Vistara is a beater flight in compare to Jet & Air India for domestic journey.

Aircraft run always in time

title: Amazing food, quick upgrade to premium economy at a convenient price
text: Was on a business trip with excess luggage, Vistara was kind enough to upgrade me at a small fee which otherwise should have had given for excess baggage. Food was amazing hot paneer curry with falafel bread was too good. Got my luggage quickly as well for flying Premium economy, overall good service.

title: Fabulous
text: If you have to fly, you should fly from Vistara. Next level services, all time smiling crew and ofcourse good food on board.

title: Flight to Mumbai
text:
This is my second flight on Vistara. I loved the seating space, neat and clean. The crew is very polite pleasant and hospitable.

Overall a good experience highly recommended.

title: GOAN MEMEORIES
text: Good flight book early to get good prices,food can be better ,otherwise over all good experience .......

title: True 5 star domestic airline in India
text:
This was my first flight with Vistara. I was impressed with the quality of aircraft service food seat comfort and the leg room.

The aircraft is brand new thats understandable as Vistara is a new airline. The leather seats are really comfortable with ample leg room. I opted for the Asian Veg meal. I was served Noodles which were very tasty. I guess they have taken inputs from their parent airline the legendary Singapore Airlines!. The tea served is Wagh Bakri which is a famous brand from North India. I have tried this tea before and liked it and was surprised that Vistara is offering this in their flights. Service was top notch.

The thing that they could up their game is the in flight entertainment, They offer streaming service on the mobiles. The content was limited. There is scope for improvement.

Vistara will be my first choice to fly within India.

title: One word - BEST
text: This was my first travel with vistara and i think i would never travel with any other airline. The experience, hospitality, timing, food everything was class apart from any other Indian counterpart.You simply have to experience to believe

title: Best domestic airlines
text: Vistara services are the best domestic airline services in India. from flight booking to travel, in flight service all the services at their best.

title: Luxury in air at its best
text:
The best hospitality and service one can avail for a short distance is through booking Vistara airlines.
Trust me it's the best in its own class. 
The words are too less to describe the experience you take with you and feel like coming back again for the same.

title: Professional and valued customers time and energy
text: Vistara’s service is effortless. The boarding process is planned and thought out as per international standards. On-board service is smooth. It really make flying a pleasure. Checkin is so easy and usually over with 10 min which is better than any other airline. Helping passengers be comfortable is one of their top priorities. Delays are minimal and often announced in advance. The lounge services though need to extend for free to premium economy as well.

title: Flying with vistara makes me very comfortable and hygienic as the flights are new. Enjoyed a meal as a compliment.
text: Flying with vistara makes me very comfortable and hygienic as the flights are new. Enjoyed a meal as a compliment.

title: Comfortable Flight
text: A very comfortable flight starting from boarding the flight getting in to your seat and then reaching your destination, Vistara takes care of its passengers very well. The overall ambient inside the plane, leg room space even in economy class is very good. Not to forget the food they served on board is tasty and good. I loved the flight and would definitely recommend Vistara for its great service and professionalism. Cheers!!

title: A short quick flight with more than expected professional staff and service on board
text:
It was my maiden journey with Vistara. Heard about them a lot. so was expecting the same level of professionalism. The flight journey was comfortable and not at all bumpy given that I was traveling in the prime month of heavy monsoon.

title: The best airline currently to fly Domestic

In-flight entertainment has a wide collection of movies and TV Shows apart from music. Just remember to download the app before boarding. I try my best to fly Vistara as far as possible.

title: Best domestic airlines in India
text: Currently air travel in India is cheap and has multiple option. VISTARA is the latest entry into the sky. I extremly happy with their services.  Few reasons, the CV or reward point earning is very fast,  each travel will add the point and it is so attractive that reaching Platinum is so easy for frequent flier. Currently I am gold member and avail airport lounge in many airport. Vistara has exclusive lounge in Delhi T3 airport and it is very high standard. Next is price. It sometime lowest fare among all other airlines. If it is not lowest it become not too high. Next is hospitality, the ground staff, baggage handling and crue members really very positive towards passenger. I had harrowing experience in another domestic airlines who consider travellers like Their servant. Vistara give a class feeling to travelers. Next is food and snaks  which reflect true sense of hospitality. Next interier, it has smart entertentment facilities which has unique experience. finally safety angle. Highest safety which every passenger expect from airlines. The only challenge is tire two cities are not connected. I hope their air network will expand in future. My overall experience is excellent.

title: Best airline in India
text:

Clearly Vistara treats their employees well - for, all employees seem to be fully engaged with their roles and duties.
The only airline currently in India that makes a traveller feel welcome, doesn't make one feel like an unwelcome nuisance :-).

title: Best airline for domestic travel
text:
This was my 3rd or 4th flight on vistara. I had a business class ticket so there was almost no queue to collect the boarding pass and the security check. I got access to GVK through my boarding pass itself. It's arguably the best lounge in India, though I am yet to visit an American Express lounge for which I have heard only good things. 
For vistara flyers, GVK lounge offers a complementary beer or glass of wine. I chose red wine. 
The lounge is not far from the gate, and I was in the first few to board the aircraft. A complentary mocktail was offered shortly after and we were presented with a menu. I was carrying some reading material, so I decided to read that followed by a quick nap. The air hostess then woke me for the meal, but I wasnt hungry because of the meal at the airport. Still I decided to taste the food a little and food was nice. After the food service, I was asked to choose a beverage and I asked for the much advertised Starbucks coffee. I will rate the coffee as slightly below average but the presentation was good in a ceramic Starbucks coffee mug. it was only 2 hour flight which ended shortly after the coffee. Overall excellent experience.

title: Delhi to Kochi
text: A little delayed review but I flew Vistara from Delhi to Kochi in August of 2017, I had booked the flight about a month before and got a pretty good deal as they were running a promotion. The check in process was great we could check in at the New Delhi Metro station and get our boarding passes there. The overall process was simple and quick, plus dropping off the bags at the metro station was helpful. Once we got the Delhi International airport Vistara is at Terminal 3 so its a quick walk from the metro to the terminal (airlines like Indigo and Spicejet are at T1 for which you need to take a bus). Security was quick and once we got to the gate it was pretty fast boarding and the flight took off on time. Unfortunatly there is no in flight entertainment so we had to rely on watching the saved Netflix shows on our iPads and listen to music. The food service was good, there was a selection of vegetarian and non-vegetarian meals plus tea, coffee and other soft drinks.

title: Alternate carrier option
text:
Being a Jet Airways frequent flyer and the airline being in news for all the wrong reasons, it's only fair to start checking on other airlines at par with Jet Airways.

Hence I decided to take my return flight with Vistara. 

I was originally booked in premium economy but I got it upgraded to Business. However to misfortune, the boarding pass printing machine had died at Hyderabad as well.... it took me forever to get past the check in.... that's twice in 4 days with Vistara at two different airports. What are the odds?

Having experienced that at T3, I didn't let that experience bog me down. And I'm glad I made that choice.

Flight departure/arrival was on time and in flight hospitality and service was exemplary.

I'm relieved, with Jet's future looming large, I can find my comfort with a suitable alternative in Vistara.

title: First experience with Vistara

Despite being in premium economy check in counter, it took forever to check in. I thought I made a mistake having booked with them. Ironically the boarding pass printing machine had died.

Having got past that hurdle, I wasn't expecting much. It's best to expect the least with that kind of experience.

However, on time departure and arrival coupled with exemplary in flight hospitality and service helped me get past the debacle at the check in counter. Over all a good experience and value for money.

title: Extremely Professional Service
text:
I am travelling this morning, 6th Nov 2018, from  Delhi to Kolkata on Vistara flight  UK 747. The scheduled departure  was at 7.45 am  from IGI T3 and we reached airport at 6.15 am. Following is my overall experience about the flight ( Rating given out of 5, 5 being the highest):-
A. Check-in: Checking st Counter C was slightly chaotic due to only three counters open for too nany passengers (Rating 3).
B. Lounge access: I was flying economy and hence there was no lounge faculty offered. I used my Mastercard to access airport lounge(Rating Neutral)
C. Boarding and departure: Boarding opened at 7.10 am at Gate 55 through aerobridge. Boarding process was smooth and fast. The departure was on time. (Rating 4). 
D. Seats and interior: The aircraft was an Airbus A320-Neo series and new. The interior in Vistara signature Grey and Purple faux leather upholstered seats and beige wall looked bright and well lit. My selected seat was 15D, an aisle seat at the middle. Seat pitch was reasonable with slightly cramped legspace. Seat recline was about 115 degree.(Rating 3.75).
E. In flight Service: The in-house magazine Vistara provids good informative reading. Hot breakfast was served. Bread roll, butter, masala omelette, parsley potato, grilled tomato, mango dahi and coffee or tea. Quantity, quality and presentation was great much better than all other full service airline in India. Snacks can also be bought from on board CAFE AUBERGINE, if you so wish. (Rating 4.5).
F. Arrival and baggage: Flight landed at Kolkata at 9.40 am  Gates were opened at 9.45 am. My luggage came very quickly on the belt. (Rating 4)
G.Overall flight experience and suggested area of improvement : Overall flying experience was good.Staff was well groomed and polite. (OVERALL RATING 4.75)

title: Dishonest baggage policy
text:
The flight was fine and flight crew was accommodating. However I was disappointed by what I believe to be a dishonest baggage policy. On my first inter-India flight with Vistara, I checked my reasonably sized bag no problem and with no extra fee. On this flight, however, I was told my bag (which now weighed less) was overweight. I was prepared to pay the overweight fee. I was offered an upgrade to business class for something like the equivalent of $80 USD or premium economy for $25 in order to check my baggage. 

Thinking I had no choice, I paid the $25. However, I later heard a friend of mine traveling on the same flight had mentioned she was traveling internationally and would later be on an international flight from Delhi. Vistara waived the baggage fee and said this is standard policy, as long as a customer brings it up first.

I don't feel I should have to know a secret password phrase like this in order to not be taken advantage of.

title: Unhygienic Food quality
text: I was quite impressed with my first flying experience with Vistara hence decided to again use Vistara from Goa-Mumbai journey. At Goa airport Vistara Kiosk wasn't working and could not identify my PNR number hence I had to go to check in counter to print boarding pass in spite of having only cabin luggage. Morning non veg snack box was served containing a chicken wrap and a muffin. Upon opening the box a live fly came out from the box. Most probably this fly was enjoying the muffin inside the box. After complaining to the crew member they quickly replaced the snack box and gave me printed apology letter which I think wasn't sufficient. Airline with tie up with Singapore airlines should be setting excellent standards in their customer service and also in providing hygienic meal to their gusts. as per Industry norms I should have been duly compensated for such a big issue but that did not happen.

Firstly, it is a premium airline not a low cost carrier (LCC) like Indigo or Go Air.

When counters for premium economy & business class are free they ask the passengers of the economy class queue to other counters for smooth passage & less chaos. They greeted me with a genuine smile & spoke courteously & politely unlike others where the scene is fake smile  with standard lines being spoken with no eye contact.

title: FALL OF THE MIGHTY
text:
It was a great disappointment to travel by the so called premier airline of the country, having a very good pedigree of Singapore Airlines and the House of Tatas. The travel cost for a journey of less than 250 km was more than Rs.4,000 and the delivery was minimal.  The boarding was started good 45 minutes before the take-off, with early get-ins cooling their heels in a hot environment.  The Air-hostesses were most shabbily dressed, I do not know who has designed the dresses for them, which resemble those worn by nursing staff of one horse town hospitals. Some cold sandwiches were served during the flight and I rightly opted out as the passenger on the next seat rated them as very poor. 

The landing was rather bumpy and no announcement was made of the number of belt from which the luggage could be collected.

Over-all, a very poor experience.  They are rightly thinking of going into the budget airline mode, as they rightfully belong to that category only.

title: Calm, quiet and super comfortable
text:
I flew home from an exhausting business trip on Vistara. 
I rushed to the airport as I was worried that like when I previously took Indigo, I would have to stand in a long line of people pushing. 
I walked in, the staff brought me straight to a vacant counter and before I knew it the check-in was complete and I had a lot more time the spend at the airport then expected. 

The boarding was just a smooth. They asked the passengers to board in specific groupings. So things went fast.
While boarding I was offered a bottle of water, which was nice.
The seats are comfortable and the airplane was clean and looked new.

The crew and pilots made us all very comfortable and the experience was relaxing. 
The food options were good and allowed for a super experience. 

Just fly Vistara, they are levels above the rest.

title: Travel in luxury for near budget prices
text:
At the check in the lines were already separated which made the experience extra pleasant from the start as I did not have to stand in line for a very long time. The check-in attendant was super friendly and the entire process was completed in literally less than 3 minutes.

The lounge offers a good variety of snacks and full meals and the quality was excellent. 

I checked in also through separate lines and once I sat down a flight attendant asked if I wanted some water while boarding continued. The seats were clean and comfortable. I did a quick check of the rest of the airplane and it all seemed clean and in a very good condition. 

Once we were in the air I was offered another drink and presented with a menu for the lunch options. The entire experience was surreal. As a frequent traveler, this was the first time I experienced business class style service for Premium economy seats. The staff all the way to the pilots were courteous and all about making the customers comfortable. 
While in India Vistara is my airline of choice, instead of the Indigo that is like a sardine tin.

What got me was upon arrival they had a special line/ area for female passengers. I was blown away and absolutely loved it.
Great job Vistara.

title: Its Different...!!!
text:
Vistara is a full-service airline and that means you don't have to pay for Food and Drinks except for few items which part of the menu in any class. 
Some good points are: They are very punctual, seats are very wider and comfortable, very caring ground and cabin crew members and the best part is food which is really very delicious. Also, they have an in-flight entertainment system, where you can watch Hindi or English movies and other pieces of stuff. I also experienced early arrival at destination. It is really a value for money Airlines.

title: Unexplained experience
text:
Took the 5 pm flight from Kolkata.

Smooth boarding and take off

Flight almost full to capacity.

Frankly I was served well and the snack of chicken tikka n cutlet was good.

The row in front of me, 16th to be precise, got missed out for service delivery. Passengers had to get the air hostess's attention.

Passengers on the 16th row were then served their refreshments. Surprisingly it was done, without any apology and in a professional manner, not generally associated with Indian hospitality; and that too after a good 5-7 minutes, after being reminded. Dunno what to make of it.

Landing at Delhi was bumpy, could have been better.

title: Professionally managed airlines in domestic sector
text: Every details are well taken care. The ground staffs are very professional, the flights are on time, the seats are good, food is very good, the crews are very well mannered, in flight cleanliness is very good. Good value for money.

title: Different from others
text: Very punctual,wider seats,very caring crew and most importantly food/snacks at every leg make this airlines totally different from the rest.I also experienced early departure and arrival at destinations

title: Quite a letdown
text:
I was expecting quite a bit from a joint venture between Tata and Singapore Airlines. I was frankly disappointed with the service. The crew was rather lack lustre and disinterested.
Food was the best part of the experience, though the quantity served for lunch on the Delhi - Mumbai sector was rather miniscule

title: Good Flight starbucks coffee
text:
Very comfortable seats.
Nice menu and they serve starbucks onboard.
Only compliant I have is that the flight was delayed on both legs and no prior information was given. So we got to the airport and found out the flight is delayed by 2 hours

title: A tough compitetion to Jet!
text: First time I traveled with Vistara, I didn't know what to expect but the first impression was quite good once entered the flight the interior and color combination was fresh and nice. The best thing about Vistara is I think has to be the leg space you get ample of leg room to sit comfortably and to relax. The food was good but quantity could be improved. I think there's only one thing which was missing for Vistara to become India's best airlines is that they don't have the In-flight entertainment . If they add the In-flight entertainment  I don't think there's anything that can stop them to become the no. 1 airlines in India.

title: So awesome journey IXR-DEL
text: was Awesome Experienced very well Comfort Journey  during my trip to IXR-DEL  so friendly staff  neat and clean  after all trip was very well safe and secure journey

title: A new experience in Air Travel
text: I've been waiting to fly Vistara for a very long time. I finally got the chance to try the Bom Del route. The boarding at Mumbai was a bit far at the airport, but the food, in flight space was very good

title: Currently the best airline
text: It was a comfortable journey. They have comfortable seats and their choice of food is good. Best airline i have traveled so far.

title: Vistara airline stole 3 Designer dresses
text: After reaching Delhi from Mumbai, I found that 3 if my expensive designer dresses were missing from my check-in baggage. After following up with Vistara I was told that they can't see the bag being messed up with. I never expected Vistara would steal "clothes" and they said I should have checked at the airport!!! I should check how many socks, undies I have remaining in my bag after theft. Worst airline ..Fly with it and surely get robbed. Worst airline worst customer service. The standard of this airline is absolutely very very low.

title: Probably the best currently
text: Tatasia Vistara is probably the best available choice in India all new aircraft good food & the overall feel is really good.

title: Capable service provider
text: The interiors are colourful and welcoming. The leg space is poor in economy and the inflight entertainment didnt work on my phone. The vegetarian food was good but the pastry had a brown dot! This is not done..the least that could be done is to inform guests while serving the meals. The staff in premium economy ran out of food and hassled the poor girl in Economy. She was serving the premium economy staff as well as passengers!

title: Best domestic airline in Indian skies!
text: Punctual performance, nice premium feel cabin, hot tasty food in sufficient quantity... Vistara is currently best domestic airline in Indian skies. And surprisingly it's prices are comprable to leading no frills airlines.

title: A good flying experience
text: This is a new and colourful flight with a little bit of less leg space. But never mind the service and the behaviour of the Ground Team and the inflight Team makes up the loss of a little comfort. The check in process was good. The welcome on board was pleasant and the behaviour of the crew was excellent. They were taking care of everyone. Since the plane was new so we felt the difference of comfort. I think they have enchroached upon the space of one row which could have been left for leg space. The take off was good, the flight was good and the food was also good though in a very small quantity. They, if save money from the packing, can increase the quantity of food. This is my suggestion to them. I like their beautiful packaging of the food but the cost borne on this reduces the size of food. A very comfortable and lovely experience, though I could not get any of the front rows, but even then the journey was good. Thanks to Vistara.

title: Classy airline, but faced a blooper with ground staff at IGI
text: Booked this flight a couple of weeks back last minute at the airport because of a previous travel fiasco while travelling with 2 young kids . Specifically asked the desk agent that we needed seats together. Unfortunately, did not carefully check boarding passes until we got on board to realize that all 3 tickets were in different rows. The ground staff called in to resolve also seemed clueless, until some kind fellow passengers offered to swap seats. Once in the air, it was a peaceful flight. Ground staff at Bengaluru was especially helpful in getting luggage and porting it all the way till the Taxi zone. Still think this is currently India's classiest airline and will happily go back whenever possible.

title: Bistara Tata SIA JV
text: The best in domestic sector in respect of cleanliness,hospitality,food,comfort and last but not least SAFETY

title: Very Comfortable experience in economy travel
text:
Had a Very Comfortable experience altogether & if I think for value vs services & experience I'll say I am in profit 

I shall take more trips on airlines, also probably in business class very soon

title: Best Indian Airlines
text: Vistara has the best service among all Indian Airlines, even their Economy class is also good. Food quality,taste and packaging are also well maintained.

title: A FLIGHT TO REMEMBER
text:
I was surprised to find that on the day of travel [ 5.9.18] i was accommodated in
Premium Economy thro Web Check in even though i was holding a Economy class ticket.I enjoyed my Flight it was more comfortable with Window Seat [ 6 F]. Thanks to VISTARA for this gesture.

I have to blame my self for opting for a Jain Meal [ VEG JML ], in future i go in for Pure Hindu Veg.

Cabin crew very friendly and helpful. We had a very smooth landing.

title: Good airline
text: Only problem is they ask you to stow away even your tablet for the entire duration of take off / landing. Can understand about laptop but no other airline asks to stow away tablets. The food is usually quite good, however this time it was very salty. While choosing a seat, because there is a premium economy slot, the economy numbers start very close to the wing so attention should be given to this fact.

title: India's Best Domestic Fully Serviced Airline
text: After a long time India has got a great domestic product of International standards. Great service, great food, separate premium economy cabin which is definitely quieter than the economy so is fantastic. I would definitely fly Vistara and try to reschedule my travel time in case they do not suit my timings.

title: The Best Airline of India is Vistara!!
text:
I first flew Vistara last year on my trip to and from Srinagar and boy was I stumped!
The service was impeccable in both the onward and return flight.
I then flew Vistara this year in June on my trip to Bangalore and bck and they continued to impress and amaze me!
If I include the cost of seat selection,cost of food and beverage in a LCC...the ticket price of Vistara works out to be almost the same or a tad more.
And I don't mind spending a bit more for comfortable seating, better hospitality, better choice of food and beverage and option of airport lounge too.
I am scheduled to fly them again later this month and I look forward to another pleasant experience with them.
Fly Vistara and you will feel the positive difference!

title: On time and best service that I have experienced on any of the domestic airlines in India
text: The attitude and conduct of the airline staff, both at check in counter and on board the flight was very cordial and warm. Service was prompt and efficient. The seats were very comfortable with on line entertainment during the flight thru Vistara World app. The food and beverages (lunch) served was complimentary, fresh, delicious and apt for the time of day. The flight operated on time.

title: A very welcome change from the humdrum so called low cost airline experiences of the past.
text: Booking was easy, check in was easy, flight was comfortable, snacks/food was good, staff was helpful and courteous. It was a welcome change from other private airlines experiences of the past. Congrats to the management and employees.

title: Exceeded Expecttions
text:
An excellent company.  The ground staff were helpful and friendly as were the cabin crew
The food on board was very good. There was ample leg space and the seats were comfortable.  We arrived on time and te luggage was off loaded quickly  All in all I wouldn't hesitate to recommend Vistara but remember there is no film radio etc

title: Amazing service
text:
We came back from our Andaman trip to our home on 29th August, 2018 by Vistara Airlines. 
The service from Vistara is amazing. There was complementary food even in economy class. 
The quality of the flight and the behaviour if the cabin crews were simply superb. 
The only issue I had faced was, the legroom was not adequate compared to other airline company's economy class. 
Rest everything were absolutely amazing. 
If you want good hospitality and smooth service, try Vistara.

title: Purple poshness
text:
What difference can an airline make when nearly everything is identical to a plane from another airline?

It is the customer service. And food, perhaps. 

Both were on point for me. All formalities were done smoothly. And since I booked from the website, I also got priority boarding! Hows that to feel special and all? 

Planes inside have purple ambient lighting.

title: Best In Flight Experience
text:
This is one of the best Domestic Flights I ever traveled in . The seats were big and spacious comfortable . The staff was courteyes and helpful.
They had an In-flight Snack for veg and nonveg both which was delicious all in all amazing experience

title: extremely insulting ground staff, disrespectful towards elders, not ready to use commonsense.
text: worst experience, and zero customer service, they dont even have the courtesy to talk to you and only answer in a preset format. Wouldnt suggest this airline to anyone if there there are other options available.

title: IT WAS GREAT
text: It was very nice flying with vistara and that also in the business class. The check-in was very nice.

title: Best experience ever!
text: Had a great experience with Vistara. The airport staff was very helpful. And in-flight crew is outstanding. It was such a short duration flight but their service was top class. We were served breakfast and the packaging was something I had never seen before. The food was great. (Have seen many giving a dry cold sandwich or some oily food). The seats are comfortable. And it was on time. What more can we expect? It's one of the best. Has to be...it's by TATA..pride of our nation.

title: Smooth experience-very good ground handling
text: The check-in at the airport is very smooth, the staff is courteous, in-flight service is also good though the inflight crew (stewardesses) are not as groomed as they earlier used to be. Sitting space is also quite comfortable. Experience is far better than all other airlines operating on Ahmedabad - New Delhi route.

title: VIRTUES OF VISTARA
text: A  wonderful experience.  The services from Check in to Baggage Claim were very smooth, hasselfree.  There was an attendant who helped to claim baggage for a senior citizen like me.  He was very courteous.  The seats and cabin are posh and gleaming.  The service in the cabin by affable crew is exemplary.  I had great time in the flight.

title: Most pleasant
text: Kudos to Vistara for providing a smooth and memorable experience on their airline. Check in was a breeze due to the self check-in kiosk. The flight was slightly delayed, however, the boarding process was made very smooth and organized so the delay was minimized. The flight attendants were very pleasant and attentive. The on-board meal served (lunch) was very fresh and delicious - a pleasant surprise, considering the quality of airline food. Overall, an enjoyable and hassle free experience.

title: True to the Image!
text: Though a frequent flier myself but, being a  maiden voyage in Vistara Airlines, I was going through some anxious moments as to what would the real experience like. Yet, I was agog with  a lot of excitements and anticipations, going by the reputation of Tatas and the Brand name of Vistara. As it turned out, it was a very sweet surprise and turned out to be pleasant experience in the end. The air-hostesses  were refreshingly different , being a little less  obtrusive and the ambience inside was truly different in terms of the feel and exquisiteness on account of several factors, the most important being the behaviour and approach of   crew members.

title: a business or leisure fly its good
text: clean and soothing with good staff and above all good time management. a good beverages can make your day if you are on flight

title: Best domestic airline
text: The airline aircraft are all brand new and are very clean and well maintained.The staff are courteous and efficient and the announcements are clear and  audible.The food served was hot and appetising.It was a pleasant experience all in all.The baggage also came early on the carousel.Would definitely recommend this airline.Unfortunately very few flights from Bangalore.

title: Value for money
text: excellent service. Tasty food. Good and cozy seats. prompt service. on time. Flight undisturbed. Reading material fresh. quick delivery of luggage.

title: Vistara flight experience
text:
Nice service- service was super quick and the washrooms are hygienic.
Courteous staff- staff explain each and every thing - does and don'ts . 
On time- flight is on time and we reached our destination on the given time only.

title: Comfort and warmth
text:
After a long time I was on a flight which had large roomy seats and very polite and smart staff. 
The overall experience has made me change loyalties! I hope Vistara stays this way and does not go downhill as previous new airlines have done!

title: Women's Day on Air
text:
Being a short flight,we chose to sleep so my wife & I were having a nap when we heard an announcement by one of the crew member about woman's day and thereon two cabin crew were seen distributing a badge and rose exclusively to all females aboard which is such a great gesture,I felt in such a short time frame.

Perhaps not to mention all crew members were having a warm smile on their faces throughout the flight which is such a pleasure. Looking forward to fly back soon on the same carrier.

title: Class with Prudence to keep going Strong
text:
Over the years you have seen Damanias, Modilufts and Kingfishers go down and Jet taking a severe beating, All trying to be airline they were not in different ways.
Here you have an airline with best economy legroom, so far over 8 flights in an year no major delays (have had jet,spice, indigo all in one dleay or other), well groomed cabin crew, announcements you can hear and understand, small food servings frugally packed  but well chosen not to be a dampner still giving you full service feel and now an in flight entertainment on your WiFi devices.  Given the price they seem to be currently giving taste of experience to people before the can charge more. Well I guess an extra 20 percent would not be too much to ask as with current serving and ticket prices and 80% occupancy, sure they are sinking money.
It is still for me a Class you can expect from Singapore Airlinesand TATAs venture. Hope we see this one survive the hard competition in Indian Airspace and be the domestic Airline we can be proud of.

title: Currently the best airline
text:
The best domestic airline from the current lot in India today.
Though they have introduced cost cutting measures in food , and also the staff is a little less polite, but better than others.

title: Seats are the best
text: Seats are quite comfortable.legroom is adequate though the seats do not recline. Width of the seats is similar to business class seats of other airlines.

title: Surprise surprise surprise
text: I travel a lot. I have flown many airlines. This time visit to India my travel agent suggested to book all inside flights with vistara. I cannot complain about anything. They meet or exceed my expectations. I hope they keep up with there quality of service.

title: Excellent service with awesome hospitality
text: This is the first time I took Vistara flight service and as the saying goes First impression is the last impression, would love to say I am highly impressed with overall Vistara service, right from check-in counter staff to In cabin service. Very courteous and humble staff, which most of the flights are missing these days. The In cabin experience was also good, neat, clean and properly air conditioned. Ample of overhead luggage space. The quality of food is very good when compared to other airlines serving complementary meals. Only one suggestion Vistara should expand their in flight entertainment library. I highly recommend Air Vistara and Wish them Good luck and expect they will maintain their services in future also. Thanks

title: Worst experience
text: This was my first journey with Vistara ,  I had a bad experience with them. noone was asked me for my  meals even i  already paid the amount in ticket after finish the trip I asked the cabin crew member why did you not  provide me the meals they didn't have  actual answer. really I am very unhappy with this type of service provide by the vistara .

title: Comfort at its Best
text: I have flown many times via Vistara and every time am wowed by their service excellence. They really know how to take care of the passengers and take utmost care to cater to their comfort. The food served on board is also one of the best in Airlines sector. I am so converted now that I don't want to fly any other airlines domestically if I can help it.

title: ONE MORE VISTARA EXPERIENCE
text: I should say Vistara is well ahead of all available airlines in india,as service is concern Vistara is serving best in his class,Best aircraft's,Best Meal on board,Best Staff ,all in all Vistara is good option for flying lovers ,All the very best to Vistara for his International operations in coming days

title: Best in Class
text:
I am a regular flier. Vistara continues to be my preferred airline now. 
This evening flight (5 pm) was a good experience. Seamless baggage drop, then easy boarding. Premier Economy is pampered with cold towels on seating. The leg space is good and I could work throughout the flight. Had a charming flight attendant, Manshi, caring but not intrusive. The food was good... A light, tasty paneer snack for vegetarians, with pita bread, and dessert, one soft drink from a fair variety and Starbucks coffee. 
The arrival was on tine, disembarkation was smooth, though we had to wait a while for the Gate at Delhi. The luggage was available on arrival as Premier Economy has priority baggage handling. 
Overall, I really enjoy the ambience and class of Vistara.

title: Vistara  is the Five Star Airline of India
text: Vistara is one of the premier airlines of India. The in house dinning is excellent and food quality is above par. They also provided wet face tissues on request and cabin crew was more than helpful. Their flight airline magazine was quite informative. At the place of luggage pickup belt, there was a dedicated desk to help the alone travelling women. Best airline to fly. Special mention to check in staff who stood up to welcome and greet us. Best behavior in the aviation industry.

title: great hospitality
text: The trip was made comfortable with the in flight staff who were courteous and warm, and the food was nice and warm

title: Smooth sailing over the sea
text: Check in, luggage check  was smooth . Security check was slightly cumbersome since we had to remove our shoes, belts etc , system probably freshly introduced .On board call and boarding was also in time . The flight took lesser time and we reached before time at Port Blair . In fact the flight time is less than two hours though they mention about two and half hours . The crew inside were helpful and courteous . Vistara provides small snacks packet and tea / coffee also during flight . We had some bumpy ride due to bad weather and air pockets . Deboarding and luggage delivery were also smooth and hassle free . Overall a nice experience .

title: Chennai to Leh Via Delhi - 4 Travels all by Vistara
text:
Having traveled on most of the Airlines in India I can safely say that VISTARA stands out on 2 counts over the rest :

1. Leg room even in Economy travel.
2. Inflight Food/Snacks which is Best in class and the quality is such that it doesn't give any problem to your tummy unlike many other Airlines. Above all it is Free.

I recommend travel by Vistara.

title: Go to airline in India
text:
Vistara is a great airline in India with hub in New Delhi. I fly vistara as much as I can when in India, between cities like HYD, BLR, CCU, AHM. All flights connect in Delhi . The premium economy is great with food selection off a menu and a dedicated flight attendant. I always book premium economy as the prices are really good. on occasion I upgrade to business for about 7500INR when checking in at the counter which allows me extra weight in checked luggage of course. Most airlines in India try to squeeze every buck out of you if your luggage is overweight, sometimes even weighing your carry-on; I have found that this is not the case with Vistara as they have not charged me for a few lbs of excess weight.

Airplanes are always sparkling clean and cabin crew is extremely polite even calling passengers by name.

My number one airline in India.

title: Good Flight
text:
Check in and boarding very prompt and well organized
Clean cabin and washroom
Average leg room
Prompt take off and landing
Very polite and courteous crew.
Sonia especially provided excellent service - keep it up!

title: Conference
text: Travelled in Vistara for a second time after a long gap and I just fell in love with their efficiency, service and the quality of the food. My respect and admiration for the entire team as they have looked into every detail to ensure the customer gets the best experience and I have decided to choose Vistara as my first option hereafter for my travel and I greatly recommend as it's every worth the penny that it's paid for and kudos to the entire team once again.

title: Best airline in India
text:
The SIA-TATA partnership is reflecting on the quality of service. The food and legroom are amongst the best amongst the Indian carriers. The flights were on time and boarding was well organised.

It's a pity that their network from Bangalore is limited. Hopefully they expand their network in the future!

title: Good flight but breakfast needs to be improved
text:
Travelled on Vistara from Delhi to Mumbai on the 8:45 am flight.

Flight was full. Managed the window seat on the emergency exit. Good leg space.

Clean take off and landing. 

My issue was with the breakfast served, especially the veg fare. Poha, which was possibly kept too long in the oven, was bland and over dry. Moreover no ketchup or chutney or lemon to go along with it. Along with the poha was the suji ka halwa;  somehow didn't quite click with my sensibilities or palate. The sweetened yoghurt and bun somehow satiated my hunger.

Why serve tea or coffee when your breakfast already covers your entire tray. Suggestion is to serve the hot beverage post serving breakfast.

Otherwise a decent flight

title: An IDEAL Air Service Line
text: We my wife  72 and myself  82,  have to travel by Air almost every alternate month between our homes and that of my daughter and airlines being of the shortest time taking journey and free from political obstructions we have no choice but to stick to it. And naturally our experience varies from flight to flight and Airlines to Airlines.Must confess I was rather sceptic about vistara with a preconceived notion that it is just that a high-priced service with stiff upper lip. But while searching through flights available in the net I find that it was not at all a high priced and rather convenient in time for us. So I booked our flight in Vistara. Courtesy started at the check-in counter. The young lady there offered me  one window and middle seat.we were happy. they helped us with our luggage. and helped us to our seats. These little 'Help's meant much for us. Real service started on flight. We were impressed by their personal care as to our comfort if it were alright with us etc. our country is a land of VIPs I heard we have nearly 6 hundred thousand listed an imaginable number in a civilized and a Democratic Republic. So as we are typically LIPs we never expect anything anywhere any attention and quite used to rude and curt treatment.  So those polite inquiries touched us so much! The lunch on flight is a forgotten affair. We didn't pay for it. So such good and mouthful items was something unexpected. I remember once I could not get even a little water in spite of repeated requests. The Airlines are so keen on economising their services these days! So We thanked through air hostess the captain and all the on board staff and for everything. One more point to add. I suffer from acute ear ache during landing. But with this flt I didn't feel that much.

title: Cancelled flight and delayed refund
text: Cancelled flight due to weather but two other carriers flew to the destination minutes before. Were told that we would be issued with an automatic refund however a month later this is still to arrive despite chasing it with the desk at Delhi airport 3 weeks later. Poor customer service - I sense they do not consider their customers well at all from overall experience. Shame because I have had a good experience with Singapore Airlines directly - I expected more from a new carrier bearing their name as well as Tata.

title: excellent
text:
Very good food & Service.Staff was very friendly.
Only wifi was not proper it was discount automatically in every 5 mints.

title: Class flight
text: Excellent flight. Good color combination, food quality, services and ambience. Spacious. Friendly and supportive staff.

title: Excellent
text: Very organised service. Easy check in process. Extremely friendly staff. Very tasty food. Comfortable seats.

title: Non supportive checkin staff
text: This is one of the worst unsupportive staff i have witnessed while travelling from vistara.... first of all the staff asked us to wait for almost half an hour and then i was carrying my upgrade voucher to redeem for which they said the server is down and you carry on with regular booking and will be upgraded at the time of boarding..... but all in vain no upgrade done... i lost my upgrade voucher as wellll

title: Vistara!
text:
This was my first flight with Vistara, I have heard lot good things about Vistara, so thought to try this airline for my trip to Delhi. Till check in to end my experience was great. Staff was good after long time I have experience such great Customer service in sky, inflight meal teast good. 
Most important is seating experience and I found that there is good legroom so you can travel comfortably. 
So after long time good flying experience with any airline.

title: Helpful crew
text: Flight delays are inevitable I know. However it was a smooth ride for the rest of the flight. Service was nice. Inflight catering was okay. Crew were attentive  to the customer's need. They accommodated most of their requests. Keep it up.

title: My Favourite Airline, Stale Food in Business Class
text:
Air Vistara is by far the best airline in India and I prefer flying it when possible ( due to their limited connectivity out of Mumbai).

Recently I traveled from Mumbai to New Delhi  by UK 930 , in Business Class. Overall service levels were great as usual, but where it faltered was in some portion of food. In my breakfast the idlis served were stale and rubbery. I showed the same to the hostess she promised to report it back to the authorities. the rest of the breakfast was good , but the overall great experience was marred by this freak experience.

Trust the airline will take due notice of the same. ( picture attached )

title: GOOD PLANE BUT ALWAYS LATE
text: I love to travel in VISTARA airline because they give bigger legroom for all seats with entertainment system as well. Seats are comfortable with big leg room and plane is also very clean. but only issue is this airline always late

title: A budget price for a luxary experience...
text: A traveller only takes back experience with him.. the only good thing one can get in flight is good seat, good food and a great ambiance... this flight was consisting of all..and with a extremely supportive crew... it was a pleasure travelling with vistara...

title: Smiles in Air
text: Always Remind me of the good old days of Kingfisher Airlines Everyone ready for help with smiles on their faces from check in to baggage delivery. Smiles in air is the right wordings i can suggest for them. Hope connectivity & frequency becomes better

title: Excellent Airline
text: This is my first time flying with Vistara and I wasn't sure about it!  The whole process  from check in, onboard experience, the food, the inflight service, detail to attention and excellent service really surprised me.  Vistara is an excellent airline with high standards and a pleasure to fly with.  Highly recommend Vistara.

title: Domestic Airlines - World class Feeling
text:
After travelling multiple times in Vistara (both Premium Economy & Economy) writing this review

Check in was smooth and there are absolutely no issues. Ground staff are helpful and they allowed some extra luggage even after free allowance.

As there are tight schedules between the connecting flights, most of the times i got delay for boarding. The simple reason was "incoming flight delayed"

if that’s the case, I don’t understand why they schedule the flight with that tight schedule.

Once the aircraft reaches the airport, the refilling (De boarding, Boarding, fueling, food, cleaning) was done very quick and absolutely there are no issues.

They offer the boarding Business, Premium economy and economy.

Premium Economy :

                                Dedicated air hostess
                                Welcome Drink
                                Separate Menu (for Veg and Non Veg)
                                Sufficient Legroom
                                Comfortable seats
                                Premium Cutlery
                                Priority Boarding & de boarding
Economy :
                                Sufficient Legroom
                                Comfortable seats
                          
If you plan to book the tickets well in advance, go for Premium Economy as there will be a very less difference in fare.

Because of the Traffic congestion at IGI Airport, waited almost one hour in the aircraft i hope this is because of "incoming flight delayed".

Vistara team worked very hard for the customer satisfaction. when the flight was delayed for almost 3 hours, they offered water bottles to the travellers.

This was great for the domestic airlines to offer something to get the customer satisfaction.

Food was excellent as this was owned by TATA and i feel food prepared specially for Vistara from TAJ.
Food Contains Bread, Butter, Salad, Dahi, Non Veg Meal, Desert, Juice, Water Bottle and of course Tea/ Coffee from Starbucks.

Crew was really good and helpful.

Overall very good domestic airlines offers world class treatment except for the delays for Incoming flight and Traffic Congestion.

title: Fantastic Service
text:
The check in again was quick and efficient and I was soon settled in my very comfortable seat on the flight. The leg space as promised is definitely much more as compared to Economy, the seat recline is also greater making the in-flight experience enormously more comfortable and pleasant.  I was offered a cold towel by a cheery air hostess, a much needed respite after the stickiness of the Mumbai weather. As the flight taxied I was presented a menu with 3 options to choose from  2 vegetarian and 1 non vegetarian for my lunch
 I opted for the vegetarian continental, the Oriental Vegetables with Fried Rice. Also accompanying it was a beautiful Chickpea Salad, a chilled rasmalai sort of pudding and a bread roll. A selection of cold drinks and juices is also available to go with your meal.  And if that’s not enough you can further choose to end your meal with a Starbucks Coffee or Tea.
