Regards,
Rahul Dalal

title: Best domestic airlines
text: In my choice vistara is the best domestic airlines in India. Their every flight is new. Food is better than air India and far far better than jet airways. Food is completely. Punctuality is also very good.

title: Early days doesn't excuse sloppiness
text:
I've done about half-a-dozen flights on Vistara and each flight there's been some minor glitch or the other which is more a reflection on controls over staff and supplies than anything else. The senior management of this airline appear to be full of themselves and this attitude appears to have a trickle down to the rest of the staff downstream.

I've had dairy creamer that was 6 months old, seats and seat pockets not cleaned from previous sector, rude check-in staff - and all this usually on Premium Economy - for which I don't think I am going to pay premium prices anymore.

Vistara may do well in the future, once they have more aircraft in their kitty, as of now they run fewer routes and schedules than their competition and their frequent flyer programme is difficult to figure out too.

title: A new freshness in the air
text:
A young airline doing an excellent job of establishing its credentials as an efficient, ontime carrier.

There is a welcome newness which Vistara are trying hard to maintain. 

Keep up the good work.

title: Fantastic experience
text: Excellent service! Treated like V. I. P.'s Kid's car seat got premium handling Yummy free food :) :)

title: premium econ seat
text:
One way COK->DEL flight. Chose the airline primarily because of the price (7200 INR in total) and good departure time from COK (1835h), as compared to other airlines' offerings (many of them more expensive, and also departing early afternoon -- so for a leisure traveler hoping to make the most of available sunlight hours, taking the Vistara flight offered more hours of play time for a lower cost.) Took the premium economy class seat when it happened to be close to the price of a standard economy class seat, although it was the same seat width and food. 

Onboard, the seats were comfortable enough. One noticeable thing was that it did not have AVOD, at all. For most domestic flights (1-2 hours) this should be fine. This being India, and COK to DEL in particular, the flight was 3.5 hours. I slept through all this time except to eat, but other travellers may have wished for some entertainment.   

Food was excellent. Same food as economy, but in both cases the taste and portions were as good as international carriers. If memory serves, the premium economy seats had better seat pitch. 

Would certainly consider taking this airline and class of cabin again, though wondering whether it offers code-share with foreign-operated international airlines. Did not notice other flight numbers which may have indicated that the flight was code-shared.

title: Crew
text: Double standards maintained by the crew. Delays in flight. Queue up the passengers to board and make them wait.

title: A premium experience after long time
text: Being my first flight in Vistara, I was not sure of the treatment to expect. I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of service and the food. The air craft cleanliness, comfort are of highest nature. But above all was the service quality which comes with a pleasant smile, always.

title: PUNE TO DELHI IN JAN 2017
text: I flew with "VISTARA AIRLINES" from PUNE to DELHI . Except for the delays, which I heard are common for most airlines, everything went smoothly. Specious & Clean Cabin,Crew was nice, beverages and food we receives was good, price of the tickets very good. I would recommend VISTARA AIRLINES FOR SURE.

title: Adventure of a life time- Road trip Leh Ladakh vis Srinagar
text:
Great service and extremely courteous staff.

title: Wonderful Experience
text: This is an excellent airline. I have flown it several times. I just want to recount the experience in premier Economy. Normally if you have booked economy you can request upgrade by two ways. a) Standby for Rs 1500 for Del-Mumbai or confirmed for about Rs 3000/--On one ocassion i have got upgrade on standby but was not lucky in 2nd time. However whenever you book on Vistara go to their website and on two ocassions i found that the Premier Economy fare LOWER than economy and i quickly booked. Done that twice with success. The experience in Premier Economy is really great. Much better meals and leg space. Must try. highly recommended.

title: Just about average
text:
Just about average in terms of food, service etc. ... and mostly late it seems!!! 
I find the meals offered by Air India & Jet Airways much better (comparing only the full service airlines). I hope to see it change for good.

title: A new player, yet very good experience
text: Very good domestic airline though relatively a new player in the field. Food included with the airfare unlike other domestic flights, and it was very good. Well organized, and nice, courteous staff with a good sense of humor. The flight ambiance was also good with good interiors, and comfortable seats. On time, good management, and excellent service. And very value for money.

title: Tata knows sky better!
text:
Vistara has set a standard and domestic flying! even with the low prices, they are the full service airline. Premium leather seats, delicious food on board and many more....

What actually touched me is, nicely designed uniform of Cabin Crew. Maintaining dignity and self respect of every woman, yet elegant and stylish.

title: Great beginning; they need to continue the excellent service
text: Overall, it was great! Right from the airport check-in counter rep behavior, to baggage handling, in-flight services, air-hostess behavior and disposition, quality of food and beverage, seating arrangements and comfort- all seemed great! They simply need to continue the great service and on-time departure/arrival!

title: Best Indian domestic airlines
text: all good.. everything organised.. good flight.. good staff.. good food.. on time performance.. best domestic indian airlines to travel..

title: Best food, flight and staff
text: When you travel in Vistara, you can feel luxury. Even in economy. I have done premium and economy both and I can confidently say that their services are class apart. Their food is not only edible buy delicious unlike most of the airlines. The crafts are new and you can feel the difference in the leg space. Wish they would expand their routes quickly.

title: Amazing hospitality and comfortable flight
text: Vistara provided with one of the best services in terms of check-in, staff behaviour and hospitality. The flight was clean, staff was cordial and seats were comfortable with better leg space.

title: Truly world-class service for Indian domestic flyers
text: When the airline was first announced over 2 years back, I had hoped for some refreshing change compared to how the existing airlines were 'flying' their passengers. With Tata and Singapore airlines joining hands, I sincerely hoped for an experience that would remind us that we were more than just a 'seat' or a 'pax on the list'. And the change has been far more than refreshing. Even before I took my first experience, I booked tickets for my wife and my 8 month old son, knowing well that they are going to be in the best hands. I just couldn't hold myself back, and booked myself a return ticket (B'lore - Delhi - B'lore) and my first leg was on Diwali night. The memory of that journey is going to last forever with me. Thereafter, it was only Vistara and Vistara always! I make sure that I fly Vistara even when I'm flying for business.

title: Flying with Vistara UK720
text: The airline was good in all aspects. Right from boarding on to off the experience was amazing. The flight was on time to take off and before time to reach the destination.

title: Good Flight
text:
I flew from Vistara for the first time & liked the experience.
The luggage handling, boarding & de- boarding, in-flight crew, seating & food all were good. The seating had a decent space. The crew was courteous & helpful.
The flight was a little delayed due to bad weather but it was very nicely handled by the ground crew.
The only thing not so great was the staff at check-in counter. They looked a bit in panic mode. For example, one of the staff was putting a tag on my check-in luggage while I was waiting in the line & a counter just become available. The staff directing the customers to counters came to me & said in a tone to go the counter like I was boarding the plane late. It just took half an minute more with my luggage & I was standing at the counter. I didn't understand the panic there. The airline should take notice as this is the first time a customer interacts with the airline & if the staff here is not that great, the starting experience goes for a toss & it may affect the overall experience.
Overall, a very good experience.

title: My first travel by Air Vistara
text: I had heard a lot from my friends about the new Vistara airlines. All positives, everyone was having a praise for this new Airlines. However, to me the airlines did not impress much, mainly because I had already heard a lot about it and was expecting much more than that. But everything was good - the aircraft was new, the staff very friendly, food items were excellent. The ground duty staff was also very helpful. Overall, the airlines can be said to be above other airlines run by private companies. There was no announcement by pilot about the height at which flying and over which city flying. Incidentally, I heard them announcing the word "customers" for "passengers" which is used in all other airlines.

title: good experience
text: it was a good experience flying with vistara. the service is good. the food served is also good. the fare price is very reasonable

title: Very Good Among Many Airlines in India
text: Staff was very cooperative. On my request I was not charged for 3 Kg excess baggage I didn't have any hand baggage . Food Quality was also better when compared with Jet & Air India . Will definitely travel again

title: Amazing ground staff at Goa Airport
text: Every staff we interacted with at the Goa Airport were super friendly and polite. They helped us right from the time we entered the airport and guided us well to the check in counter. There certainly was a feeling of warmth and genuineness in their service. I especially want to highlight the check in staff NIDUN who was extremely polite while checking us in and helped us very professionally through the check in process. There is "service" and then there is "service from the heart" and Nidun immediately made us feel the latter. I'm glad I chose his counter to check in as it made our Vistara journey a wholesome 5 star experience. Even met him at the boarding gate where he instantly recognised my husband and me and greeted us with a big smile. Personalisation at its best :)

title: Good service
text: Good service, very friendly and helpful staff. The plain was very clean, flight attendants are always smiling and looking after the passengers.food offered was pleasantly presented in boxes.

title: Hyderabad staff is not upto the mark
text: While Vistara New Delhi to Hyderabad flight is an enjoyable experience,the return flight can seem painful.The counters for baggage check in and boarding open at Vistara's convenience.Though you will make it on time but it becomes frustrating many a times.As far as on board experience is concerned,it is excellent as expected from Vistara.I hope Vistara works on this front.

title: Best among new Airlines
text: Vistara has revolutionized budget flying in my opinion.The simple reason being service to economy class.You get a welcome drink and nice tasty food.If its a festival,your kids might get some freebies too.With same legroom,seatpitch,service and price,this is a refreshing change.

title: Great airline to fly domestic
text: i was upgraded to premium economy , i rate this airline far better than jet , i fly at least 10 to 12 flight per month and am a platinum class holder of jet , but i love flying vistara , this month i am taking 6 flight of vistara . Great leg space and good service and food quality , on time service.

title: Can be better
text: This was my first travel on vistara, thought would a different experience, but it was just an another flight on low cost carrier.. No way a wow experience.

title: Good leg room and in flight food.
text: Spacious and good food. Probably could be better on maintaining the take off and landing time. Courteous staff, but I didn't find any uniqueness in comparison to Jet Airways. Both are equally good.

title: Love you Vistara!
text: Fabulous, excellent crew with clean and spacious aircraft. Timing wise very neat. My daughters first birthday was celebrated by crew and it was amazing memory for us since it was first birthday....thums up!

title: Vistara Airlines : can be better
text:
It was first time i travelled on Vistara. I had the option to choose cheaper fare using Goair flight from Delhi to Bombay (10Dec) and Back to Del (19 Dec) but I decided to use Vistara to see service on this prime sector

I found it just like any other airlines so the fare is not justified. May be they are charging for Brand. 

May be they charge extra for meal served on flight I was disappointed.

I travelled on 10 Dec and then 19 Dec. However even after nine days, their menu was same chickpeas and bread (kulcha) which was soaked with chhole so got soggy. Though packaging was good, this aspect has to be looked into

I wonder if this standard menu served on all flights on all days.  If so, this would be pity for Tata group which is known in Hospitality and should not be difficult to come up with hundreds of options and variety for in-flight catering.

title: Great Flight. Great Savings. Great Service
text: The airline service is just awesome. Boarding time was 06:30 AM and boarding started at 06:28 AM. Staff courtesy was excellent. The flight was neat and clean and the airliner bus was also excellent. Staffs were friendly, polite. The departure time was 07:10 AM and it started to taxi at 06:56 AM. The take off time was 07:09 AM. Instructions given were loud and audible. Soon after take off on board food and drink services started. At first, orange juice or coca cola were given Only the problem was that there was no choice of meal selection. Either you select Veg which consisted of 4 Parathas, Potato Sabzi, one Bun Roti, and one Aam Dahi or Non Veg which consisted off 4 Parathas, Egg Bhuji Sabzi, one Bun Toti and one Aam Dahi and both of the meal boxes had spoon, fork, knife, handkerchief, dairy whitener, sugar. After that hot drinks were served. Finally the fight landed at Delhi airport at around 09:10 AM although the time was 09:30 AM. Very delighted with their services.

title: Good to travel with

title: Great Airline

title: Comfortable and classic

Excellent service and amazing fleet. The airline is here to stay. Premium Economy as a product is path breaking.

title: One of the best Airline (Thakns Tata).
text:

title: Lowest cost ticket at a prime time, with food provided

title: Its best in economy ticket if compared

title: Great flight
text:
Recently flew with Vistara between Delhi and Chandigarh.  Got a premium economy flight for only a few extra pounds.  Have flown Vistara a few times and have always been impressed and this occasion was no different.  Planes are new; cabin crew are courteous and efficient; plenty of leg room; and a snack included.  Only downside was there was no choice (just veg) because such a short flight, but I wasn't too worried as I had a bite to eat at the airport before boarding.

Flight was comfortable and quick, and overall had a very smooth journey.  Definitely recommend this airline based on all my experience.

title: Best flying experience in Indian skies
text:
India's newest airline and India's best at the moment. Being new means Vistara flies limited routes but it is rapidly expanding. Great service and even better food. Love the desserts they give with the food. 

Lovely choice of colour - aubergine matches their stated ambition of being India's premium airline. Beats Jet Airways hands down on service, food and on-time performance.  I have flown Vistara a few times now and it's been on-time or whereabouts every single time. 

Also, they just relaunched their frequent flier programme - Club Vistara. Felt shortchanged though by some benefits which could not be applied retrospectively to old Club Vistara members, but otherwise waiting to see how this FFP turns out. They have limited tie-ups at the moment. That said, it's just been 2 years so kudos to it anyway.

If you intend to fly, picking Vistara is a no-brainer.

title: " Fly @ Vistara ..... for Care & comfort ".
text: Perfect airlines to travel in India. very pleasant and enjoyable flight.Food was plentiful and delicious.Washrooms were kept clean.The seat was large for premium economy and the space felt good. The crew members deserve the highest praise, I felt that they walked the extra mile to maintain a conversation with all passengers, just like being with friends. I am looking forward to flying with them again sometimes in the near future. i can definitely THE BEST AIRLINES in INDIA in all aspects.

title: Pleasant Surprise
text: WE were a little worried about flying internally within India as we had heard some horror stories. After another airline (Jet Airways) messed our flights up we booked with Vistara, so pleased we did. Comfort, service and meals were all first class. Cannot recommend this airline enough.

title: Good Food, Bad Legroom
text:
This was my first flight with Vistara. While booking ticket - I opted for seat 7A - thinking, it will be just after the premier class - hence I will get the first row in economy & hence a bit space for stretching. But the saga started when I reached Kempegowda Airport. 

(1) Firstly, though I had done web check-in, I didn't manage a printout. So, was searching for Kiosk Print. But none of the kiosk had Vistara option for Kiosk print.
(2) So, was searching for the Vistara counter - which was not available at that time (well, I had reached a tad ahead of time)
(3) After the wait - had a smooth check-in (i.e. got the boarding pass). Staff at counter was very friendly/cordial
(4) Boarding process was well maintained & pretty smooth
(5) But as I entered the flight, I realized there were 3 segments in the flight i.e. Business, Premium Economy & then Economy & no physical division per se.They were separate by curtains. 

My observations:
- Business & Premium Economy were nice - as expected. With enough legroom.
- But as the economy started, they did appear claustrophobic.
- Service by on-board crew was fine
- Food served was good in quality (but perhaps they could have saved on the exterior decoration & invested that on bringing up the portion size)
- Food tray - was too narrow to maneuver

Conclusion:
- Since I got a good price/deal - I managed. But the journey was difficult. 
- So, if you prefer a bit of space, go for Premium or Premium Economy
- Do I recommend this? Hmnn...I am still not decided!

title: Best domestic airline in India and Amazing Lounge at IGI Airport
text: As I arrived to Delhi Airport from New York via Emirates, I had a 5-6 hour layover to kill before my flight with my family to Goa. We purchased an entrance to the Vistara lounge at IGI Airport which was cheaper than staying in a nap lounge or the holiday inn inside the airport. It was well worth it, very nice lounge chairs and amazing staff/service. The food was amazing as well ( I ate as much as I could). This truly felt like a Taj Hotel experience (which makes sense since the airline is partially owned by TATA). The only thing that I would say the lounge can improve on is having it's own free WIFI service like other lounges do. I didn't have an India sim card at the time and it was a little frustrating to only use the Airport wifi which has extremely limited service unless you pay for a premium and it is only enabled in a short amount of time. I hope this is implemented in the future. The flight itself was great and staff was very nice. I also think the plane should also have wifi and inflight entertainment to stay ahead in the domestic airline market in India. In America, many domestic airlines have WIFI onboard already. Other than those things I highly recommend flying Vistara after flying pretty much all Domestic airlines in India, if you have a long layover I also highly recommend paying for the Vistara lounge

text: Vistara a joint venture of Tatas and singapore airlines operates few flights now as they have not much aircraft at present. flew fromkochi to Bombay and they kept their timings and provided good  ground and cabin service/.

title: Nice experience!!
text: As compared to other airlines I liked the service of Vistara airlines more. More clean, more comfortable and also, meals were included in the flight ticket. Give it a try. Plan your next trip with Vistara.

title: best flight in current time in domestic travel
text:
this was really a great flight after a long time. i can rate it 10 on 10. food was very good,tasty . 
staff is also very cooperative

title: Fly The New Class.. Fly The New Feeling..
text:
As the tagline rightly suggests, flying in Vistara is no less then flying a new feeling. From Boarding to Landing, it was no less of a dreamy experience. Amazing Service, Great Food, a smooth Flight , and what more does one need.?

title: Efficient and Courteous service.
text:
Good experience flying with Vistara on all the previous 2 occasions i flew with them.

title: Better than many other flights
text:
A great new flight with nice interiors and good leg room. The food served also was far better than many other flights with an attractive packing.
The flight took off on time. The staff can be a bit more courteous though.

title: very comfortable Journey with informal ambience.
text: Very helpful, caring and candid customer service blended with following strict  time schedule smoothly and quality food/snacks with comfortable seating appears to be quiet convenient   &  elegant to make it a nice travel.

title: Amazing experience with Vistara
text: awesome experience with Vistara with Flight UK 781 from Delhi to Bhubaneswar. excellent in-flight service and nice hot meals.

title: First time experience of Vistara Airline
text: The flight time was 10.10 am but god knows why the boarding on the flight started late and finally the Pilot started its engine at 10.30am and finally we were in the sky at 10.45 am The Pilot gave us an approx time of landing at 12.30 pm at Delhi airport but we finally landed at 12.55 pm There were not much passengers on the flight and the air hostess were very courteous. The food served was decent and we also got complimentary perfume sample of their co-branded company.If you have no problem with delay in flight you must take the experience of Vistara.

title: An amazing experience
text: A new baby in the Airline Industry,but all praises for the team for doing such a wonderful job. I have always been an ardent admirer of Indigo but must say Vistara is an amazing airline to fly with. On time performance, great hospitality, good food, comfortable seating and not to forget the hop to excel experience by the crew.

title: Srinivas Mani
text: Excellent service. The flight crew were quite courteous and quick to attend the calls.  The food served was of top quality. Seats were comfortable.  Upholstery very well designed and of top quality.  Maintained timing.  Ground service was also very good.  It can be really called Tata quality.

title: Good food, service & seating
text: Vistara provides premium service and is always a pleasure to fly. The flights are always on time and there is better leg space compared to other domestic airlines in India. The food stands out amongst all the other services, the staff is really friendly and ever willing to help.

title: Great experience worth trying
text:
Crew is extremely helpful and friendly 
They have good food options with a full 3 course meal that includes soup. 
On a fairly short domestic flight they do a magazine / newspaper service and a cold / hot towel .

title: good staff, clean and bright aircraft....
text: a new kid on block, knowing its a tata and singapore joint venture, you feel respect for the airlines but also expect more, that was missing. its like a spicejet or indigo, prices are not cheap, service is shade better, and if you are going to town in mumbai, you land in international airport which is further. the meals served were well presented and tasty

title: comfortable seats, more leg space and good food!
text: Vistara is the newest airline in Indian aviation sector, alliance of Tata and Singapore airlines. It is definitely the best airline at present as it has good comfortable seats with more leg space and the food they serve in flight taste good too and you don't have to buy the food like you buy in other airlines like Indigo and spice jet.

title: A breath of fresh air!
text:
An average Indian domestic route traveler isn't spoilt for choices, rather accustomed to selecting least bad from the worst. 

While we all know, Tata pioneered the air travel in India, later to be nationalised by the then Government just to abuse the premium travel sector in the name of Air India, and today, the legacy Tata air had set is wiped off by more lathargic than ever, Air India. But it's not just the national carrier to be blamed par se, the full carrier premium airlines like Jet airways compete in incompetence overall too. 

Having said all this, and starved of choices, the shiny new Vistara is quite a respite. It brings in the Tata value that we are all pampered with, you will know what I mean if you're a Taj Hotels baby. 

Vistara not only has the newest boings and airbus, it's cleaner and visually appealing interiors (cooled enough) are extremely welcoming. 

Staff, both, on ground and in the air take good care of you no matter how cranky you are about anything. 

Needless to say food served by Taj catering is fresh, warm and homely. 

Net net, worth taking a flight when traveling in India!

title: Truely different travel experience
text:
This airline really stands out in terms of the facility, food and services they provide and once you fly with them, you may never ever want to fly with carriers like AI.

However, number of flights and cities in which they operate are limited and hence not always you can get their service, even if you are ready to spend some extra money.

title: Stylish new budget airline
text: Vistara really met our needs for our holiday to Kerala, because all their service is top quality while still competing with the domestic Indian low cost airlines. They fly domestic services from the new T2 terminal in Mumbai airport which suited my wife and I having flown in from London and Bahrain respectively. Very few of my Indian colleagues at work had heard of this new airline, but I felt confident that the partnership between Singapore Airlines and Tata would be a winner and it most certainly is.

title: Vistara Truly is a 5 star airline
text:
I once again flew them for thr 4th time on delhi to Lko sector and as always it was amazing.

They have seperate check in with blue carpets for Premium economy pax,Prior boarding,Pillows on every Premium economy seat,welcome drink options,Legroom of 33-36 inch which was amazing,Priority bag tag blue colour and their ground staff takes this business seriously cause everytime i fly Premium Economy my Priority blue tag bag comes right after biz pax golden priority bags,They amazing crew was very helpful and also we were served hot towels right before landing just like Biz pax,We were given a hot meal even for this 1 hour flight.

Just an amazing airline and definately the most unique in India..I cant wait for them to fly international and also they should add IFE soon.

title: Very good service!
text: Was flying in from Mumbai to Delhi, flight was 2 hours late! The airline did not sms us or have any clear communication to inform passengers the flight was running late! However service on flight was great, attention to detail...

title: TRAVELLED FROM MUMBAI TO BANGALORE
text:
It was a wonderful experiences of the cost of the  travel is  less they  also  serve dinner and coffee,tea in the flight.
Inspite of other flights for the same destination charging 100/- for a coffee.
the  seats are comfortable even in the middle of the two seats also.
it is a very good experience.
quality  of the food  served is also good.
i hope people will enjoy travelling with this  flight.

title: Vistara: A new dawn in Indian Airlines
text:
I am a frequent flier for Jet, Spice and Indigo( LCCs) and most of my flights have been to Delhi , Mumbai, Kolkata. Vistara was a new player in teh LCC segment and I decided to give it a try considering the Singapore Airline( Prekium Airline, which has collaboration with many airlines like Silk Airways) and Tata. 

The flight experience was quite  good. 4 Ratings for a LCCs price range flight. Delicious meal( though very limited) was served during flight( as it was inclusive in the cost). The best part of the journey was all the seats had much larger leg space compared to Spice and Indigo. I am a 6' 1'' feet guy and I always find it difficult to sit in the Spice/Jet/Indigo. 

Apart from the aromatic fragrance in the air craft, the staff was courteous and this gave me a premium feeling during the journey, even though I was traveling in the economy class.

title: Fly with comfort
text: Tried Vistara for the first time, Very comfortable seating and pleasant ambiance. They try the best to make you feel very important and taken care of. The most important thing i liked was the uniform. Decent - Smart - Elegant, i had to write an email specially to appreciate the same. It took my attention to that extent.

title: Terrible cancelled two flights and did not inform us and say takes 10 days before refund can be given
text:
Absolutely abysmal customer service. 

They cancelled two flights for which we had business class tickets described on them as "Confirmed and Guaranteed". After we had booked they cancelled both flights and failed to tell us.  It was only by complete chance that I noticed the day before we were to leave England that these flights were not on their schedule checker any more. 

I rang their call centre in India and was told that both flights had been cancelled. I asked how they had informed us and they said  by text. When I said no such text had been received despite them having the correct number on the booking he suggested it might be because it was a UK mobile phone number. No email confirmation of cancellation had been received despite them having correct email address.

 Despite having cancelled both flights they had kept the money I had paid them.

I obviously asked for the full refund and they said that it would take ten days before this could be enacted because it was an international credit card. Interestingly there was no such delay when paying for the tickets.

Astoundingly bad service which could have completely ruined my trip if I had not noticed problem by chance.

title: Still room for improvement
text:
On 8th Sep i was returning from B'lore. I choose Vistara as i am a vistara club member(silver). This was second time i was flying with vistara. As i requested for Aisle seat i was given the same immediately. Staff are friendly. Ofcourse better than go air and Indigo. 

I wanted to rate them excellent but due to two reason i can't. 

1. During boarding process even though i had silver membership and there was separate queue, i was asked to wait by the ground staff. As i was not in hurry i waited for few min and then again asked showing my boarding pass again. Got a reply that "I haven't seen you, or you might have shown the boarding pass to other" though i was standing next to him for few minutes. 
See in service industry first impression is last impression. 

2. The second spoiler was dinner. I already had disgusting experience in premier plaza lounge.  When food was served i asked for veg. It was not up the mark. I just had to satisfy myself with curd. 

I hope they read my feedback and improve.

title: Nice Flight.. Staff needs training
text:
Took the early morning flight from DEL to BBI after reaching DEL from the USA. Booked Premium Economy as I had 2 Checked-In baggages. 

At DEL airport, I could not find any pointers/boards regarding the check-in counter opening time. The Check-in had Air-India uniforms probably this was outsourced to Air-India. How can a airline outsource a people dependent job to Air-India staff. 

The process at gate was smooth. Seeing the Air-hostesses one gets the feeling that they are freshers and this is their first airline cabin job. The person who was making the announcement spoke Hindi with an heavy English Accent. The hindi announcement on Swiss Airlines flight was more genuine that Vistara's.  

Food was good. The flight was quiet and take-off was smooth. Landing was relatively smooth considering the weather conditions at BBI.

title: A breath of fresh air
text: Excellent addition to the Indian skies...focused on service...hope they add a lot of new flights....soonest

title: Amazing experience
text: The crew was courteous, the service great - I was given a pillow for my comfort, followed by wet towel to refresh myself. This was followed by an appetiser and a yummy meal. Leg space was enough. Flight interiors seemed to be quite good as well.

title: indeed a new feeling.
text:
i flew from banglore to varanasi via delhi with 3-4 hour layover at t3 terminal in delhi.
i'm going to straight away point out the good and bad about vistara.
pros
1. access to air bridges on every airport, very good for comfortable and fast boarding and de boarding.
2.awesome food which includes in flight fair.
3.the inflight wifi system to which you can connect n watch movie or series they have, plus newspaper n the hospitality.
4. very smooth flying experience.
cons
1. air hostess are still inexperienced and it can been seen in thier flight operations.

title: Vistara - An Airline to fly with
text: I was pleasantly surprised by the manner in which the passengers were taken care of, from check-in till boarding. Very systematic check-in and professionally managed boarding (similar to Emirates when you are flying out of Dubai). The upkeep of the aircraft, the food they serve and the in-flight service they provide is great. Hope they are able to sustain and maintain their standards. After flying Vistara first time I always prefer Vistara whenever there is an option and have flown four times so far.

title: A Memorable Flight
text:
I was not feeling well and when the airhostess want me to select the food, I told I dont want and fell into sleep, much before take off. After 2 hours,  I saw my seat was reclined, all the four rows window shutter downed and I had been covered with a blanket. When I woke up after 2 hours of flight, the cabin crew gave me desert, which was very good, and yet another airhostess came and asked me whether she can get me a lemonade specially made for me. They made me so happy, by the time I landed in Kochi, my fever flew away. If I rightly remember some of the names, it was Sonam, Priyanka and 2 others. Special thanks to them all.

Enjoyed Tata"s and Singapore airlines hospitality to the core.

title: Hyderabad to Delhi Oneway
text:
My second experience after flying Indigo to Hyderabad from Delhi.  The return flight with Vistara was a pleasant surprise.

I was not expecting a hot meal on a domestic private airline and we got a hot meal.  The staff was helpful and friendly,  the aircraft were clean and new, the seats were comfortable and there was good legroom.

The only thing I found irritating is having to go through security, opening hand luggage again before boarding the aircraft when you have already gone through the long lines at check in and the long and slow security at the airport.  Maybe the date of travel being 14 August, day before Independence day may have been a factor in the additional check.

title: Nice flight
text: Good flight with good services. The seating wasn't much comfortable but the flight was quiet. This added the comfort level.

title: Disappointed with the un-professionalism of ground staff of an otherwise excellent airline.
text: I had already paid for and bought extra baggage allowance. At the check-in counter, without even bothering with seeing my PNR, the staff member reminded me twice that my baggage was in excess. Secondly, the flight was delayed by an hour and neither he informed nor the boarding gate informed me of the same. Made to sit there for a long time and unsure whether I had time for a quick meal, we boarded and the flight served insufficient quantity of food though it is my understanding that most full service airlines serve lunch if they are airborne between 12.00 pm and 2.00 pm. All they served was a snack. Also they had no system for a passenger to pay for and upgrade himself either at Chandigarh or at the Gate at New Delhi. Apart form that In-Flight experience was great and not much different from other full fare airlines. Honestly, I expected more from the name of Tatas and SIA.

title: Vistara--The flight I cherish
text: I had gone to GOA with the basic purpose of experiencing VISTARA ,So when i got the flight from Goa to Delhi via Mumbai there were no secong thoughts. The staff helpful, the service excellent and the aircraft neat and clean. The food was tasty unlike other domestic airlines. So doing a 3 hour journey in 5.5 hours was worth it.The only problem was at Goa where the ground staff  looked jaded ----Perhaps handling too many flights at tha same time.

title: Class Apart
text: The professionalism and courteousness of ground staff and inflight crew is par excellence. The leg room is much more than any other airlines and the food is sumptuous and the menu refreshingly new. The punctuality is another plus point.

title: Best in class domestic airline in India
text: I had pleasant surprise when it comes to domestic travel with Vistara. An alliance between Tata and Singapore Airlines has blended perfectly to bring in the right experience and efficiency without losing the Indianness in the service. The food was served hot, a rarity in domestic travel and the ample legroom is what I liked the most. A much needed alternative to the low cost carriers currently operating based in India.

title: This upcoming airline has made a mark for itself!
text: Vistara has surprised me on two occasions by upgrading me once to business class and once to premium economy without having asked for.. Premium airlines at great price, excellent service, delicious choice of food.. It is at par with any good international airlines' standards..

title: A combination of Efficiency and Luxury
text:
The flight is nice. The staff is not arrogant or careless.  Just trained to help if required.
The food is the highlight of the airline, very good food, fresh and tasty.
Efficient ground staff.
They need to increase the frequency and connectivity so that it becomes the preferred airline for the business travellers.

title: The upcoming airliner has made its mark
text: This airline has been doing very good. They are really punctual and since they are new have really good and neat aircrafts. The staff is very courteous apart from the occasional pissed off ones. The refreshments are decent. They have started hiking their prices these days, which is a little disappointing but then again doesn't every airline do that once they get good feedback.

title: Flight cancelled no refund yet
text: I would definetly recommend people to stay away from this airline. One of the worst start ups. Probably inspired by kingfisher airlines. I was suppose to fly from Goa to Mumbai on the 23rd of August.  Three weeks before the flight Vistara decides to cancel all flight from goa to mumbai for the week stating technical reasons. I am told by the executive on the phone that i will be getting my refund in 5-7 working days. Its been over 24 day inspite of repeated followup's by email no sign of a refund. I have been asked to be patient as my payment is being processed. If passengers want to avoid this please go for a reputed airlines and not for startup like these who have big names backing them but pathetic service.

title: First time on board Vistara
text: The date was 15th august. First time on Vistara. good service by crew. Though ground staff are very strict about hand baggage weight.

title: cheerful experience
text: The service is awesome. Check in, luggage handling, serving of food, etc. The cabin crew were all girls from all parts of India. I liked this concept.

title: Premium airline for comfortable fly
text: If its official travel, I prefer Vistara for its premium economy class. It has good leg room and seats are comfortable. I liked the on-flight food much. Customer service is also good.

title: Refreshing change!!
text:
After hearing so much about new Tata-Singapore airline venture, i decided to fly the new Vistara to Goa. After my first flight, i must say, they have won me over with their no-nonsense and efficient customer service approach.

Booking was done through a travel aggregator portal. On-line check-in was seamless. if you are an iPhone user, you get a boarding pass option for the wallet on your phone (I don't know if any other Indian airline company has this option. It is so convenient and cost effective and saves paper)

Airport reps were of pleasing personality and efficient. baggage drop was quick. planing process was systematic and once in the plane, the crew were welcoming and helpful. Captain's welcome was warm with flight weather and ETA communicated to all flyers.

Food was a sandwich, cookie, mango beverage - decent at best. cannot complain. crew was quick to disburse snacks and clearance as well.

Seat was comfortable. legroom was just right (i'm 6 feet tall). The magazine content was mediocre say when compared to Jet wings of Jet airways. I would like to see better content.

Overall, an excellent FULL-SERVICE airline. will definitely fly again.

title: The most horrible experience ever.
text:
Vistara being a JV between the Tata's and SIA, I had very high expectations.

But I was shocked to note the level of service before the flight.

First, my flight from Bombay to Goa was cancelled and they informed me only 2 days prior to ETD. The shocking bit was I had to make several calls to their customer service to convince them to put us on another airline on the same departure date, given that I had back to back hotel and flight bookings.

On my return from Goa, when we reached the airport, I was once again shocked to note that they had suspended our ticket! The reason being that the ticket was booked on an international credit card. We had to wait till their Delhi office could unblock the tickets after verifying my credit card!

That was not the end of our plight! The flight was delayed by an hour!

I have given Vistara 2 stars as the flying and in flight experience was great. Their level of pre flight services is horrible.

I will try never to fly Vistara again and would not recommend this airline to anyone. If you still want to fly Vistara, do so at your own risk.

Mustafa.

title: Nice airline
text: As a new c carrier, tied closely to SQ, Vitara offers a lot of promise. The planes, A320 are nice, clean, quiet and efficient. I think that whilst this is a nice carrier, it still has a way to go to settle into its niche. For considerably less, Indigo offers almost the same level of experience for the average traveller, on similar aircraft. Would I fly them again? Yes, although I would also look to other carriers as well.

title: Fantastic airline
text: Fantastic airline. From check in to lounge to seats. Everything is great. I am a gold member and got lounge access. The lounge in Delhi T3 terminal is like a 5 star hotel.

title: A very pleasant experience
text: I traveled a few months back but i still remember and cherish the experience even after traveling economy. I reached the airport 4-5 hours early and asked if we could reschedule for an earlier flight imagine my surprise when they said i could just for INR 200 wow. The flight and air hostess were very pleasant and helpful. The in house food was also very good. Looking forward to flying with them again.

title: Awesome Experience at economical price
text:
I flew Vistara with my family and it was an amazing experience. The staff were courteous and very helpful.

We had a connecting flight and had to change the flights in Delhi. The vistara staff helped and guided us through the airport and the queue to ensure that we boarded the plan on time with minimal trouble.

The food on the flight was good too.

title: Best Domestic Flight Ever
text:
I have flew first from this flight from New Delhi to Pune and was quite impressed with the service they give from the checkin ,cabin crew,boarding till food everything was great.
I must say they serve the best food among the rest airline i flew.
But the one disappointment is the time boundation as they do not fly often from from delhi or from pune.

title: Travellers Choice
text:
Vistara is a more developed version of Kingfisher Airlines. It has very good leg space unlike international airlines. The meal is served limited, but it is OK to treat yourself on a flight with a delightful meal. 

The airhostess were welcoming. It take off from Terminal 2 which is more convenient rather than a crowded airport.

title: Expand yours imaginations
text: One of the newest venture with good facilities and attitude towards passengers. I can recall the launch of Kingfisher in Bangalore but I feel they are more robust and sound in their approach of expansion plan and selecting the route. It was a good short flight packed with good experience and the best attitude you can experience for the flying staff. I hope they will maintain  the same spirit and attitude for the time to come

title: Best domestic flight
text: Flew Vistara from goa to mumbai two days back. flight was very clean, better leg space than other domestic flights, food served was hot and good. very comfortable and convenient.

title: Excellent experience
text:

title: Excellent service

title: The best airline in India at this time
text: I have traveled Vistara number of time now, and undoubtedly i will say it is the best airline available in India for domestic travel. the service is amazing, the food is always good, the flight is always on time. what else can one ask for. In fact have recommended it to a lot of people and everyone has one word to define the experience that is amazing.

title: Comfortable and good service
text: Very convenient flight. Neat and clean interiors. Sufficient leg space. Good seat belt. Nice food. Comfortable boarding system. Nice crew. Recommended for travel.

title: Great Experience
text:
Great Experience. Nice leg place even in economy seats, The on air foods were nice and warm. Good hospitality. Maintained good time through out the complete procedure.

Value for money.

title: First Class Domestic Flying Experience
text:
Despite being a new entrant, Vistara scores highly on the comfort factor.
The first time I travelled, I got a real 'Bawa' feel; but the second I third time, I just loved it. It's a combination of the best attribute of Jet Airways & AI. Good Food, Neat & tidy, loved the way they've changed the design of the food tray, such that it doesn't hurt the leg. Lots of legroom and very very comfy. I loved flying with them.
They've got a Freq Flyer program as well. I'd like to explore the premium economy concept in future.

title: Food, Service and the flight
text: Traveled to Ahmadabad from New Delhi late last year. The whole experience was amazing,flight departed on time, in flight service including food was excellent. will fly again given an opportunity.

title: mumbai
text: hey all. this was my first trip in vistara . the flight is very good and comfortable . the PE seats are also good as well as premier class. the quality of food is very god and fresh. the staff is very polite. really like vistara.

title: Comfortable with full leg space flight
text:

Every thing was same except for the personalised attention of the ground as well as crew staff.

title: loved the food
text: Loved the food in comparision with other airlines. The presentation & the pkg of the food was  good. Overall a good airline. Just travelled once so cant write much abut it.

title: Convenient
text: Very convenient and cheap flight. Good service from the crew. The snack served was good. This flight takes off from Terminal 2 at Mumbai International airport

title: Comfort is the key!
text: Refreshing Economy flight service, apt leg space, helpful and smiling team, good food and comfortable seats! Vistara has taken care of all the major needs of travellers in the Economy Zone. As a frequent traveller with Indigo, this came as a refreshing surprise. Way to go if they maintain their standards

title: Flying with Vistara
text: This was my first experience with Vistara and I really enjoy this. The staff, service and food was excellent. Over all a very good experience.

title: "Wishing vistara good luck"
text: I will always remember my first flight with vistara . I was late (thanks to Mumbai traffic) and absolutely sure to miss my flight and of course loose my money too. But one of the senior staff members accompanied me from the minute i set foot on the airport and helped me through all security till i boarded the flight. The food on board was well packed and delicious too . Altogether an unforgetful experience.

title: Great Service but cramped seating
text:
I have flown Vistara on various occasions in all three classes. The Cabin crew is very well trained and courteous. The presentation of the food is the best of any airline flying in India. The quality of the food is just about the same as other full-service airlines.

Aircraft are very well maintained and clean

A new entertainment feature that allows content to be streamed to personal hand-held devices is very innovative

On the con side, the economy section seating is quite cramped. I cannot imagine taking a long flight with such seating

title: Wow
text: Tata's & Singapore airlines combo stands to their name,a classy flight different from existing airlines stands apart.Good efficient staff,good new aircrafts good catering

title: Fly the new feeling - Very Appropriate
text:
Flew Vistara for the for the first time on 8th Aug 2016.  The Flight was light and I had all three seats for me and occupied the allotted 21F. This Airline scores well in every department.  Since I had web[-checked in it took less than a minute to enter the revised gate number. The boarding process was quick as I preferred to board last. 

After a warm welcome by the crew and settling down the push back was delayed due to the use of the Secondary Runway but the Captain kept the guests fully informed.

The take-off was smooth but there was a bit of turbulence. The food service began once the cruise was normal. I got a good feeling after the meal that this airline does care for the guests but offering the right quantity of food.
 
The landing was smooth and the plane docked at the aero-bridge quickly. 

Upon reaching the terminal I requested for the buggy and the staff called one fast.

Excellent Flight indeed.

title: Eerily Familiar: In the Image of Indian Airlines
text:
It was my first experience of Air Vistara and it began ominously.  The security at the airport gate refused me entry saying my web-checkin pass did not carry my name!  Well, after a visit to the counter I finally got in.  I had to wait for over 10 minutes just for a baggage drop.  The boarding took even longer with an additional elaborate security check by the airlines staff at the aircraft door.
I had taken care to book a seat in the economy first row.  But i was in for a shock.  Instead of having wider leg room, this row is more cramped as the premier class (something between business and economy) takes away extra space.  
The announcements were with a strong accent making it largely incomprehensible.  The refreshments were oh-so-familiar: dal and rice, dahi and a dessert.  Since my journey had two sectors, the refreshment in the second sector had the same dessert, a lemon mousse/custard.  
The only saving grace was that the flight was on time which means a lot.  But it is also a little worrisome to note how much the airlines reminded one of the erstwhile Indian Airlines, the food, the announcements, even the interior decor.  Finally, the stewardesses' attire could have been better designed: it resembles a pajama suit!
I booked on it only because it had the cheapest ticket going, but next time i have to think twice.
Being a new airline I would give them the benefit and expect them to improve over time.

title: First time with Vistara, customer for life !
text: We travelled from Mumbai to Vistara, it is nowhere your another Indian airline, it is the best in the class. Loved the new vistara lounge, the food offering during flight was great. Leg space is great.

title: Veg Travellers - brace yourself for possibility of flying without food
text: I had settled into my premium economy class  Flight from Bombay to Delhi - it was an afternoon flight and  Meals were included in the flight .  I  had an hectic morning and  was pretty exhausted .  To my complete surprise and horror , by the time the flight attendant came to my seat , she declared that she had no Veg options available ,  no fruits etc. were also on offer .  All she could offer me was a 200 ml juice bottle .   It was a horrible experience and I had to fly to delhi on an empty stomach .

title: Get what you expect on Air
text: The check in was smooth with the just a carry back pack. The inflight food service was good. The leg room was sufficient could stretch a bit during the 2 hours and twenty minutes flight. Staff were efficient.  A pleasant journeyy.

title: Disappointed
text:
I'd heard so much about India's newest airline but it didn't meet my expectations

From the cabin crew presentation to the food (chicken sausage pulao!!) I was disappointed 

The cabin colours looked good and of course, are new 

It's premium positioning isn't evident anywhere 

I wouldn't choose Vistara if I had other options

title: A delightful experience
text:
Flew from Delhi to Mumbai on the 29th of June 2016. After the experience flying low cost airlines, the Vistara experience was a very pleasant one.

Though the flight was delayed due to inclement weather, the in flight experience more than made up for the delay. The extra leg space as well as the wonderful continental meal was a major departure from what we get in the other airlines.

Watch out competition. This is an airline which is going to set new standards once it adds more destinations to its kitty.

title: Best Airlines to fly within India
text: I flew by Vistara from Delhi to Goa more than an year back and since then have made it a point to go for this airlines only when flying in India. There is no comparison with other Airlines as the Seats, quality of food and On time performance are outstanding.

title: Small details matter
text: The booking experience at the airport counter was alright except that the staff member got my husband's name wrong three times, despite spelling it out loud for him and also got our surname wrong despite him having my DL for reference. Baggage security check staff turned up late and could not be bothered with work even after coming.  Check in counter staff were mechanically friendly, as compared to the other domestic and international staff i have met so far. Boarding was efficient, so was the cabin experience. The flying part was also good. We were informed about the baggage belt before deplaning. Excellent, except that the bags came on another belt and passengers had to be informed individually by airport staff looking for bag carrying tasks. If the small details are left out, what is missing is warmth. The passenger is not a bag, but a human being, Vistara.

title: Customer Oriented
text: The in-flight service was very good. But what I really appreciated was when I came home and remembered that I had left my iPad in the aircraft seat pocket. When I called them the next morning, they could locate it within 2-3 hours and made sure I got it back in the same condition. Very cooperative staff!

title: Fresh, New and top of Flying machines
text:
I have flown Air Vistara about 12 times (18 incl my family) - mostly in the long BLR-DEL / DEL-BLR sectors, on both economy and premium economy.
I must say - this is the new benchmark!!
As expected, the aircrafts are new and the staff are fresh, but there is a certain peppiness to the whole in-flight atmosphere. The uniforms are smart, functional and different in colour, makes the in-flight crew perform their activities without worrying too much about 'adjusting' their appearance. The seats are the w-i-d-e-s-t in this business. Food - most delicious, hot and packaged neatly, even their cutlery area notch above other plasticy options. Fares are comparable to any competitor. In-flight crew are friendly, compassionate and one can feel the warmth of our national airline many years ago.
All in all, any Vistara flight is a wonderful experience, that just grows on you and wants one to look forward to another experience, not just another or any other flight!

title: lack of consistency
text:
First flight was  happy as  found  a little higher price than other economy flights was justified by good quality food . Second flight food was pretty bad .last flight in to Pune we (3 passengers )  flew in July  and flight was delayed by more than an hour . delay flight coupons were given to  premium economy and to economy passengers -only those who demanded - seriously ??? travellers in economy are biggest chunk ,not a good idea to save cost - left an unpleasent  memory for me .
What is good is the legspace  , pleasent staff  ,and according to the two persons travelling with me the in flight entertainment was a good experience .

title: Travel by Vistara
text: It was a good experience in Vistara, the flight was on time both the times, the food is very Nice, leg space is better than its competitors, staff is friendly and cooperative. Will prefer it over others .

title: Great Flight
text: Had heard a lot about this airline ,Singapore and tatas hadto be good. The leg space was good ,the food served was good and hot.The service was very good ,the staff was helpful and courteous.The flight was on time ,the pilots address was clear and we were able to hearit.The landing was comfortable.

title: 5 stars for good reason
text: This was a first with Vistara for me. Knowing the strong business background from which this airline was born, I did raise my expectations before my flight. And I wasn't disappointed. Prompt check - in with outsourced yet very polite and affable staff. Boarding was organized fairly well. Since it is a fairly new airline with a brand new fleet of aircraft, the interiors were impeccably spic & span. Was warmly greeted by very well groomed cabin crew, I love the uniforms too, practical to work in and elegant at the same time. The business class cabin I flew in was spacious, I love the overall purple & dull gold colour scheme of the seats and not using cloth as the upholstery instantly ups the luxury of the cabin interior. We had a decent selection of meals & drinks presented on printed menu cards. Although the food tasted average, the warm service provided by the Cabin Crew was really a pleasure. They interacted with me on a personal level, I felt like a guest, not just another pax. Lavs were spotless as well. The galley was kept neat all through the flight. Disembarkation as well as luggage handling was overall satisfactory. I am so glad to watch this airline take its steps into turning amongst the top today.

title: awesome
text: They have best of the aircrafts with bestest service.  They give excellent service with super duper food.

title: Its new and its pretty good !
text: Its a young and a hip carrier. The aircraft are new and well maintained. The cabin crew is alright and the food is good. They are priced economically. All in all Vistara is now my preferred airlines.

title: Pleasure flying wid little glitch
text: It was my first flight with vistara. Flight was delay because of weather. Had an pleasant flight. Just had issue with their call booking centre otherwise it was a good experience. You all and see the cleanliness and tidiness in the aircraft and the staff was cooperative.

title: Excellent Hospitality
text: Old couple were travelling in same flight belived to be for the first time the airline offered complimentary food to them they denied the knew only local language Telagu the Airhostes most of them from North East explained them in every possible way and made them  comfortable they even took my help to communicate with them to make them understand the food served is complimentary.all the crew was so nice and helpful to the old couple in making their trip memorable........ hats off to entire crew

title: Very Good
text: It was first time flown by Vistara got Premium Economy paying nominal Charges and I must enjoyed the flight. It felt kind of fresh feeling. Awesome service and food.

title: Great beginning
text: This was the first time I was traveling in Vistara. Flight was right on time. Onboarding  was smooth and positive vibes could be felt while entering the flight. Comfortable seating, complimentary food and on time arrival. Things could not get better than this. Complimentary food was not very delicious though.

title: Good experience

title: Delhi Bombay Run
text: New aircraft and efficient service from checkin to baggage claim.  The good point is that this airline leaves and arrived at the international terminals. Price is good too.  As far as airlines flying domestically in India, I would say this is a good one.

title: experience in my first vistara flight was beyond expectation

title: Fly the new feeling ...... Every time ......
text: It was always a new feeling... Best Airline in India , departure from new T2 International airport Mumbai. Always on time, best service.

title: A beautiful flying experience
text: A new airline with new aircraft and very good service. Snacks given were tasty and hot. The staff were cordial and very hospitable.Overall a very good experience flying by Vistara.

title: Good experience
text: Professional service. Flight was on time. Food was 6 on a grade of 10. Kid's meal was slightly better. Overall experience was fairly satisfactory. The premium economy in my opinion is just a sham but the different strokes for different folks.

title: Great JV of TATA & SIA
text: Vistara is a well maintained, neat and comfortable aircraft.... I had a great experience of the airline as I was trying it for the first time... and I found the experience is completely different from the one I had with other airlines... free meal in the aircraft is an additional feature..

title: An extremely good airline
text: I had the occasion to travel for the first time on this airline recently and the experience was extremely pleasant. The service quality is top grade and it is establishing a new benchmark for the Indian airlines.

title: good ambience, nice plane

title: Lots of hype
text:

The efficiency and courtesy of ground staff and crew also just about eqauls other airlines. Over all not a "way beyond" experience.

title: Least Bothered attitude on Vistara
text: First ever flight I have taken on Vistara just to try out the hyped service claim on this TATA SIA carrier. It seemed that I was flying on the old Air India attitude Airline....with the cabin crew as if they were on a protest and were forced to service the passengers. The Air hostessess all of them never had even half a smile and seemed stressed out and got the feeling of being least bothered to the passengers. After this experience I who have been flying now extensively for over 38 years have not flown this carrier and do not intend to in the near future as well.

title: An air line to bear in mind
text: This was my first flight with VISTARA and it was a pleasant surprise. The staff at the checking counter couldn't be more helpful and always with a friendly smile. The same goes to the flight attendants and service. Of course being such a hort flight, they did their best to make our flight pleasant.

title: Amazing experience
text: This was my first flight in Vistara. Amazing flight with cabin space. courteous cabin crew. They offer the delicious meal on the board. Great going Team Vistara. Thank you for your service. Hope to fly soon.

title: Undoubtedly the Best in our country at present
text:

The aircraft, though new, was spic and span. The food was really great and the presentation was very different unlike what most airlines do. 
In flight announcements were very clearly audible.
The  touchdown, perfect and so was the baggage claim, just there when I reached the belt.

title: Huge expectation but let down by the service !
text:
Having read a lot about Vistara Airlines and their service standard , I have booked Premium Economy seats for my family. One of the seats were upgraded to Business Class when we reached the boarding point which We were very thankful. 

At least by the feel ,Premium economy does not add any value to the travel. Service was poor - they kept on delivering the wrong orders and no apology. May be initial days but seriously , its not delivering the service which they claim they are providing.

title: FLY VISTARA (If available)
text:
Good Airlines to Fly. Good food including choice. Very good service. Perfect times maintained. In the recent past I have flown this Airlines 5/6 times and never arrived destinations later than the scheduled arrival time. Hope they will keep it up.
Only problem! Vistara only flies to a very destinations of my requirements. Hope it will increase with induction of new Air Crafts. In many sectors you may find the fares cheaper than it's so claimed no frills Airlines.

title: Own living room in air.
text: Wonderful airline with amazing ground staff and crew members. Right from the check-in counter to bid farewell at the gate on arrival, it was a seamless operation. Their service can be compared only next to Japan Air Lines. Food was delicious. Plenty of leg room. Seats are ergonomically designed. Air hostesses were very courteous, attentive and always with a genuine smile. I would love to fly with this airline more often.

title: Most comfy Economy class experience
text: We traveled Pune-Delhi, Delhi-Srinagar and back. 4 trips with same airline. The seats are comfortable, more leg room. 2 times we traveled during lunch/dinner hours. We were concerned if the food provided would be enough for us. However, the food provided was tasty and fulfilling. They serve variety of food even to the economy class as opposed to just water or nothing in other airlines. I recommended all my friends to travel with Vistara. The staff is polite and well trained.

title: Worth the price of the ticket
text:
This was an amazing experience - new planes, lots more legroom (both in the regular economy and the emergency row) and good airline food! 

Also the staff are courteous and somehow don't have that impatience that other airlines have.  

Recommended - worth the extra you pay for the ticket.

title: Comfortable journey & a great experience
text: I flew on this sector with my family. The entire process from doing the web check-in to baggage drop off, the in-flight services and finally the luggage pick up was pretty smooth and comfortable. The service quality was top class. Highly sophisticated cabin crew that offers service with a smile. The seating was comfortable with added cushions. The food quality and variety was also appealing.

title: 1st choice
text: New aircraft, Great food, Air hostesses well spoken and helpful, Check in staff is courtious. Have flown on this airlines before also and this surely will be my preferred airlines.

title: A Class Apart

title: Value for Money
text: Excellent experience, value for money.  Great Food and service. Clean toilets. Nice check in process.

title: New aircrafts, Friendly staff and good food
text: This airlines has new aircrafts which is a plus as the seats arent stained and dirty just yet. The staff is friendly and the food is good. They have one of the better leg spaces available in the domestic market at the moment,

title: Amazing Experience
text: One word Amazing & Convenient ride....Planes are new spanky clean unlike other airlines where there is peculiar smell  in aircraft and thankfully there was one.Landing & take off z smooth.Food is amazing though they are giving it complimentary due to new competitor is this industry..Overall a very nice experience and we are a member now.....

title: Professionally managed
text: Travelled by this newly started Indian airline for the first time. It was satisfying on all counts - punctuality

title: Great Service & very professional
text:
Did a to and fro couple of times in the month & am regular on Vistara for business trips. 
- The ground services (checkin, boarding) are very good and have never seen a delay with them
- Leg space and seat are comfortable with Premium economy.
- Had mixed experience with the food onboard. During one on the flight the food was not great but on the remaining trip it was very fresh.
- Could have some entertainment and wifi onboard for customer comfort.

title: A Flight that reminds you what flying was all about
text:
Domestic flights in India have become too crowded but with it has come down the services . Vistara is relatively new entrant but is backed by TATA and singpore airlines . 
From check in till one gets down the services are all remarkable . I would highly recommend to check the prices for premium economy and economy , some times when Premium Economy is empty the prices are lesser then Economy. 
Food is same for both except for an additional fruit drink in PE and wet towel . 

Flight is always on time and I have seen that staff helps those who are taking connecting flights by deputing someone to take them to correct terminals to save on time . 

I highly recommend Vistara

title: Innovative
text: Staff looked fresh and smiling all the way. Packing of food was very innovative, very different from other domestic flights. Legroom was as tight as other domestic airlines. The only problem was getting my points credited to my Club Vistara account.

title: The Best
text:
A very comfortable domestic journey after a long time. Seats are good, food service better than any present player over the indian sky. Had not tiredness after journey.
Service at the ground and in flight was excellent. Meals served were fantastic.
Over all a good experience.

title: Trusted and comfortable Service from Tata Group
text: Even before check-in, a passenger starts feeling that "Vistara" is concerned about need of its travelers. The guidance received at right time through SMS and ground staff helps travelers to move without any stress on mind.

title: Good service - Good Value for money
text:
I regularly travel both for official as well as personal work/leisure.

This was however, the first time that I flew Vistara & it was a very good experience.

Right from the online tkt. booking, to online web check-in to check in at the airport was smooth. The only glitch was that the flight was late by almost 45 minutes.

Needless to say a big negative.

However, once inside the plane, it was good. Obviously, with new aircrafts it will be better.

The food was also very good. Both in term of variety & taste.

Definitely one of the better options to fly within India.

One last observation - The uniforms of the air hostesses could be more trendier.

Looks like we are flying the airline of an islamic country

title: Feel the Difference with Professionalism

Every class is having something different and good to offer. Hope, soon more highlighting presence will be across to spread the good message all through..

title: very good staff and overall ambiance within flight was very good

title: Nice flight

title: Awsome

title: Best Domestic Travel
text: Great experience after upgrade to Business Class. Right from the word go- booking, check in, boarding, in flight and disembarking, everything was perfect hospitality.

title: Excellent World Class Service

It was my second travel with Vistara Airlines. The service matches the top notch Airlines of the world. Very friendly staffs at check in and in board. title: Amazing !!

title: BEST AIRLINE .. EXCELLENT SERVICE

title: Unexpectedly Good.

title: One of the unprofessional and terrible behaviour
text: We were group of 4 couples flying from mumbai to cochin  for our honeymoon trip to kerala. We were travelled from ahmedabad to mumbai in another Airline. That day there were heavy raining in mumbai so due to traffic condition in mumbai airport our flight landed 30 mins delay. And we were rush to departure for check in at vistara airlines departure point. As we have reach at last minute the attendant was about to print our boarding pass one of the manager comes and told boarding has been close. We were know that due to heavy rain our mumbai cochin vistara flight will also get delay. So we argue with the manager a lot finally after 15 minutes of argument he told that he will allow only passengers not our luggage. And finally we have to decide that 2 of the people will left over with all of the luggage at mumbai only. And rest of us rush to the flight. Later we come to know that flight was already 1hour delay. So once we reach to the aircraft we told our colleges that flight will depart 1 hour later why he should allow our luggage and all of us. So they go to the manager and fight with words but he still didn't allow them to board. Very rude and unfriendly behaviour of the airline staff. Will never travel and  recommend vistara airline.

title: Amazing experience
text: I traveled from New Delhi to Srinagar in Business Class. Your baggage limit is 30 kg and Priority tag attached to it. You get lounge access at Vistara Lounge near Gate 41. The lounge is amazing. Boarding is offered on Priority. Hot towels are offered, lime juice and aam panna. The menu is provided from which you can select whatever you want to eat. Meals are served in cutlery instead of other packaged boxes. Yummy meals as well. Overall a wonderful experience.

title: Weekly commute
text:
Goa for me is a weekly commute. Business travel makes me visit these days weekly and later maybe twice monthly. Vistara is the only carrier I use. My plans are made around the flight. I have other choices but stick with Vistara. 
From The Bombay ground staff to on board, they go out of their way. The Goa ground staff though are in a different category. The are simply outstanding. They make Vistara great. A pleasure to deal with such caring and well trained staff in Goa. 
On board. Clean. New. Smiles by all the crew. Food, super. And if it weren't for Bombay's overcrowded airspace that delays every flight, the journey would be flawless. Vistara helps in taking away a lot of those irritants!

title: Premium service
text: Was very keen to try the new Vistara airline when it started and on the first opportunity I took it . While checking in I was suggested to upgrade for a nominal sum which I did and it was well worth the price. Better service , comfort and baggage services. Recommended !

title: Fly away !

title: Comfortable experience

title: Wonderful

title: Luxury Flying in pocket friendly way is Back in India
text:
WoW !! WoW!! WoW !!

once you get in A320 you will be surprised to see the interior decor and amazing legs space.You can actually sit relax and strech without disturbing the passengers sitting in the row before .

title: Excellent service

title: Perfect !

title: Efficient Service with a Smile
text: Experienced some good service in a domestic route, right from the check-in process till the baggage delivery at destination. Trust, the airlines keeps up the quality of service befitting a Tata enterprise!

title: good airlines
text: amongst the good airlines in the city . its not one of these cheap no frills airines. it serves meals too..the checkin process was fast and boarding procedures were also quick ....landed before time for a change...

title: Excellent Experience
